Policy: Resolución Nº 172-2016-MINAM ─ Pautas Generales para la elaboración del Diagnóstico Integrado del Territorio.
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución aprueba las Pautas Generales para la elaboración del Diagnóstico Integrado del Territorio. La presente Resolución, considerando que la Guía Metodológica para la Elaboración de los Instrumentos Técnicos Sustentatorios para el Ordenamiento Territorial, identifica, conceptualiza y define como instrumentos técnicos sustentatorios del Ordenamiento Territorial a la Zonifi cación Ecológica y Económica (ZEE), los Estudios Especializados (EE), el Diagnóstico Integrado del Territorio (DIT) y el Plan de Ordenamiento Territorial (POT), aprueba las pautas para el Diagnóstico Integrado del Territorio (DIT), como un instrumento técnico que integra y analiza la información generada en la ZEE y los EE, permitiendo completar el conocimiento de las condiciones y características ambientales y sociales, así como de la dinámica y tendencias de crecimiento económico de un determinado ámbito geográfico, y de sus implicancias en los ecosistemas.

Policy: Resolución Nº 174-2016-MINAM ─ Plan Estratégico Sectorial Multianual 2017-2021 (PESEM 2017 - 2021) del Sector Ambiental.
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución aprueba el Plan Estratégico Sectorial Multianual 2017-2021 (PESEM 2017 - 2021) del Sector Ambiental, que forma parte del proceso estratégico que conjuntamente con el Plan Nacional de Acción Ambiental (PLANAA), entre otros procesos de planeamiento ambiental, y procura proponer las directrices estratégicas en la temática ambiental que contribuyan directamente a la realización de los Objetivos Nacionales del Plan Estratégico de Desarrollo Nacional (PEDN), denominado Plan Bicentenario: El Perú hacia el 2021. En este sentido, el PESEM del Sector Ambiental se destaca por proponer las directrices ambientales que ponen como centro de toda la intervención ambiental el impacto positivo que tienen estas en el desarrollo de los habitantes del Perú. El PESEM establece los siguientes Objetivos Estratégicos Sectoriales: 1) mejorar las condiciones del estado del ambiente en favor de la salud de las personas y los ecosistemas; 2) promover la sostenibiliad en el uso de la diversidad biológica y de los servicios ecosistémicos como activos de desarrollo del país; 3) fortalecer la capacidad de adaptación y respuesta de la población, agentes económicos y el Estado ante los efectos adversos del cambio climático, eventos geológicos y glaciológicos; 4) promover la reducción de los GEI a nivel país de los sectores y servicios productivos; 5) fortalecer la gobernanza y cultura ambiental.

Policy: Décret n° 2016-399 du 07 juillet 2016 portant création du comité interministériel de la validation des besoins et de la gestion du processus d'opérationnalisation des nouvelles préfectures.
Policy_Content: Le présent décret crée un comité interministériel de la validation des besoins et de la gestion du processus d'opérationnalisation des nouvelles préfectures. Ce comité a pour mission d’étudier et valider l'estimation des besoins en ressources humaines, matérielle et financières faites par le ministre de la décentralisation et de la gouvernance locale au titre des années 2016, 2017, et 2018 ; gérer le processus d’opérationnalisation des nouvelles préfectures ; veiller à la répartition géographique équitable des services régionaux et des directions départementales aux fins de faire départements des pôles de développement. Les membres du comité sont issus des ministères ; et des syndicats des travailleurs du secteur public et privé.

Policy: Décret n°2016-397 du 07 juillet 2016 portant fixation des chefs-lieux des départements de la République du Bénin.
Policy_Content: Le présent décret fixe les chefs-lieux des départements de la République du Bénin. Il s’agit respectivement du Département de l’Alibori (Kandi), le Département de l'Atacora (Natitingou), le Département de l'Atlantique (Allada), le Département du Borgou (Parakou), Département des Collines (Dassa-Zoumd), Département du Couffo (Aplahou6), Département de la Donga (Djougou), Département du Littoral (Cotonou), Département du Mono (Lokossa), Département de l'Ouémé (Porto-Novo), Département du Plateau (Pobè), et Département du Zou (Abomey).
Subject: Land & soil
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Least Developed Countries, North Atlantic, Western Africa

Policy: Acuerdo Nº 16 - Instructivo para la contratación de personal ecuatoriano en el desarrollo de operaciones mineras.
Policy_Content: El presente Acuerdo, considerando que el artículo 75 de la Ley de Minería dispone que los titulares de derechos mineros están obligados a emplear personal ecuatoriano en una proporción no menor del 80 por ciento para el desarrollo de sus operaciones mineras, aprueba el Instructivo para la contratación de personal ecuatoriano en el desarrollo de operaciones mineras, el cual establece que durante los primeros cinco años contados desde la fecha que declare el inicio de la etapa de explotación, para el cálculo del porcentaje de personal ecuatoriano del titular de derechos mineros y de sus contratistas, se tomará en cuenta en conjunto a todo el personal ecuatoriano empleado, tanto por el titular de derechos mineros, como por sus contratistas.
Subject: Mineral resources
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, South America, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Written Laws (Miscellaneous Amendments) (No. 2) Act, 2016 (No. 4 of 2016).
Policy_Content: This Act amends various written laws including the Forest Act, 2002 (in respect of fines), the Veterinary Act, 2003 (in respect of qualifications for registration as a Veterinarian), Wildlife Conservation Act (in respect of fines for illegal activities regarding trophies), the Courts (Land Disputes Settlements) Act, 2002 (in respect of appeals) and the Probate and Administration of Estates Act (in respect of the definition "small estates").
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Livestock, Forestry, Land & soil, Wild species & ecosystems
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Eastern Africa, Least Developed Countries

Policy: 2º Stratégie wallonne du développement durable
Policy_Content: Le présent document constitue la deuxième stratégie wallone pour le développement durable. Le Gouvernement wallon dans sa Déclaration de Politique Régionale 2014-2019 s’est engagé à «agir en partenariat quotidien  et   intensif entre   toutes les forces qui veulent concourir à la transition économique, sociale et environnementale». Cette stratégie de développement durable répond à cette ambition. Elle met pour cela l’accent sur le nécessaire changement des modes de consommation  et  de  production,  en  particulier  dans  3  thèmes: l’alimentation, l’énergie et les ressources qui peuvent  jouer  un  rôle  clé  pour  rendre  la Wallonie  plus  résiliente, y créer  des  emplois locaux,  diminuer  ses  impacts  négatifs  sur  l’environnement et   générer   une   prospérité   mieux partagée. Cette deuxième stratégie comprend: une vision à long terme décrivant l’avenir souhaité pour la Wallonie au premier chapitre; un diagnostic des acquis et faiblesses de la Région en matière de développement durable dans le deuxième chapitre; des objectifs intermédiaires, à court et moyen terme, qui jalonnent le chemin vers la vision à long terme de développement durable; et un plan d’actions.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Environment gen., Food & nutrition, Land & soil, Water, Wild species & ecosystems
Keyword: Agricultural development,Pastoralism,Access and benefit-sharing,Sustainable use,Agricultural land,Biosecurity,Cooperative/producer organization,Family farming,Fiscal and market measures,Food sovereignty,Freshwater resources management,Land tenure,Smallholders/peasants,Poverty,Gender,Public participation,Sustainable development,Ecosystem preservation,Climate change,Disasters,Food security,Nutrition,Public health,Freshwater quality/freshwater pollution,Pollution control,Protection of habitats
Geographical_area: Benelux, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Atlantic, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe

Policy: Commission Decision (EU) 2016/1796 amending Decisions 2011/263/EU, 2011/264/EU, 2012/720/EU and 2012/721/EU in order to take account of developments in the classification of substances.
Policy_Content: This Decision updates the Annexes to legislation in force concerning the classification of substances and preparations or mixtures meeting the criteria for classification as toxic, hazardous to the environment.
Subject: Environment gen., Waste & hazardous substances

Policy: Global Food Security Act of 2016.
Policy_Content: This Act requires the President of the United States to develop and implement a Global Food Security Strategy to promote global food security, resilience, and nutrition. This strategy shall conform all requirements set out in this Act and aim at achieving the policy objectives stated in this Act. The President shall coordinate, through a whole-of-government approach, the efforts of relevant Federal departments and agencies in the implementation of the Global Food Security Strategy. The President may provide assistance under the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to prevent or address food shortages. The Strategy shall include specific implementation plans from each relevant Federal department and agency.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Food & nutrition
Keyword: Food security,Agricultural development,Policy/planning,Sustainable development,Financial agricultural measures,International relations/cooperation,Basic legislation,Gender,Poverty
Geographical_area: Americas, Arctic, East Pacific, North America, North Atlantic

Policy: Decreto Supremo Nº 2.830 - Reglamenta la Ley N° 767 de 2015 de Promoción para la Inversión en Exploración y Explotación Hidrocarburífera.
Policy_Content: Mediante el presente Decreto se reglamenta la Ley de promoción para la inversión en exploración y explotación hidrocarburífera. Las disposiciones reglamentarias se refieren a los incentivos a la producción de petróleo crudo, condensado asociado al gas natural, campos gasíferos con reservorios de gas seco, como así también a la administración e inversión de recursos del Fondo de Promoción a la Inversión en Exploración y Explotación de Hidrocarburos.
Subject: Mineral resources
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, Landlocked Developing Countries, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, South America

Policy: Regional Law No. 84/216-OZ “On industrial policy”.
Policy_Content: This Regional Law regulates relations originating between subjects operating in the sphere of industry, regional and state bodies and local self-government in the process of formation and implementation of industrial policy. The tasks of industrial policy shall be as follows: (a) formation and development of modern industry; (b) stimulation of industrial activity; (c) introduction of ecofrienfly processes and resource saving technologies; (d) increase of industrial production output; (e) reduction of disaster risks; (f) ensuring technological independence of the regional economy; and (g) state support and financing of the regional industrial sector.
Subject: Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific
Entry into force notes: This Regional Law enters into force the day after the date of its official publication.

Policy: Petroleum Act, 2016 (Act No. 3 of 2016).
Policy_Content: This Act, consisting of six Chapters, regulates petroleum import, transport, storage, distribution, refining, blending, testing, licensing and all aspects related to petroleum exploitation. The Act is divided as follows: Definitions (Chap. 1); Control of Petroleum (Chap. 2); Licenses (Chap. 3); Petroleum Testing (Chap. 4); Chapter offences and penalties (Chap. 5); Miscellaneous (Chap. 6).
Subject: Energy, Mineral resources
Geographical_area: Asia, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Indian Ocean, Least Developed Countries, South Asian Seas, Southern Asia
Entry into force notes: This Act enters into force immediately.

Policy: Resolución Nº 171-2016-MINAM ─  Agenda de Investigación Ambiental al 2021.
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución aprueba la Agenda de Investigación Ambiental al 2021, con la finalidad de articular la nueva Agenda con las políticas nacionales y sectoriales, con el Acuerdo Nacional, el Plan Bicentenario, la Política Nacional del Ambiente, los Ejes Estratégicos de la Gestión Ambiental, el Plan Nacional Estratégico de Ciencia, Tecnología e Innovación para la Competitividad y el Desarrollo Humano, y con el Plan Nacional de Competitividad, y con el Plan de Diversificación Productiva, entre otros. La Dirección General de Investigación e Información Ambiental, en el marco de sus funciones y competencias, se encargará de promover y coordinar la implementación de la Agenda de Investigación Ambiental al 2021.

Policy_Content: La presente Ley General del Sistema Nacional Anticorrupción (SNA), tiene por objeto establecer las bases de coordinación entre la Federación, las entidades federativas, los  municipios y las alcaldías de la Ciudad de México, para el funcionamiento del Sistema Nacional previsto  en el Artículo 113 de la Constitución Política de los Estados Unidos Mexicanos, para que las autoridades  competentes prevengan, investiguen y sancionen las faltas administrativas y los hechos de corrupción.

Policy: Nuclear Decommissioning and Waste Handling (Finance and Fees) (Amendment) Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 702 of 2016).
Policy_Content: These Regulations amend the Nuclear Decommissioning and Waste Handling (Finance and Fees) Regulations 2013 by adding two new regulations (6A and 6B) that enable the  Secretary of State to recover: from the operator of a nuclear site the costs of advice incurred in considering an agreement which it wishes to enter into under section 46(3A) of the Energy Act 2008, or any amendment to such an agreement or any proposal in relation to any such agreement or amendment; from a person wishing to enter into an agreement made under section 66 of the Act the costs of advice incurred in considering the agreement, any amendment to such an agreement or any proposal in relation to any such agreement or amendment.
Subject: Energy, Waste & hazardous substances

Policy: Ministerial Decision No. 262/16 approving the concession for mining rights in favour of the Agricultural and Livestock Cooperative named Cachingi, SCRL.
Policy_Content: This Ministerial Decision, consisting of 16 articles, approves the concession for mining rights in favour of the Agricultural and Livestock Cooperative named Cachingi, SCRL, for semi-industrial diamond mining exploitation in the Municipality of Cacuso, Malanje Province. It establishes the extension of this concession in 60 Km2 and regulates the association to third parties, programmes and reports of such activity, the cooperative integration, being the National Directorate for Mining Licensing and Registration authorized to issue the corresponding mining title.

Policy: Ley Nº 589-16 - Crea el Sistema Nacional para la Soberanía y Seguridad Alimentaria y Nutricional (SINASSAN) de República Dominicana.
Policy_Content: La presente Ley crea el Sistema Nacional para la Soberanía y Seguridad Alimentaria y Nutricional (SINASSAN) de República Dominicana, tiene por objeto establecer el marco institucional para la creación del Sistema Nacional para la Soberanía y Seguridad Alimentaria y Nutricional, el cual tendrá a su cargo la elaboración y desarrollo de las políticas de soberanía y seguridad alimentaria y nutricional, como instrumentos orientados a respetar, proteger, facilitar y ejercer el derecho a la alimentación adecuada en conformidad con los principios de los derechos humanos para mejorar la calidad de vida de la población dominicana.

Policy: Loi modifiant la loi modifiée du 5 août 1993 concernant l’utilisation rationnelle de l’Énergie.
Policy_Content: La présente loi modifie la loi du 5 août 1993 concernant l’utilisation rationnelle de l’Énergie. Notamment, on modifie, entre autres, l’article 11 concernant les entreprises poursuivant une activité économique, sans égard à leur forme légale, y non compris les petites et moyennes entreprises (PME) telles que définies à l’annexe I du règlement (UE) n° 651/2014 de la Commission européenne du 17 juin 2014 déclarant certaines catégories d’aides compatibles avec le marché intérieur. En outre, un nouvel article 11bis est inséré dans la même loi établissant que le ministre peut agréer des personnes physiques ou morales de droit privé ou public, autres que l’État, qui sont appelées à accomplir des tâches techniques d’étude ou de contrôle dans le domaine de l’énergie.
Subject: Energy
Geographical_area: Benelux, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe

Policy: Industrial Emission Ordinance.
Policy_Content: The present Ordinance implements the Environment Protection Act of 29 May 2008 and the transposes the Directive 2010/75/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 24 November 2010 on industrial emissions (integrated pollution prevention and control) into the national legislation. In particular, the Ordinance regulates the: a) operating licences for industrial installations and activities; b) registration of installations and activities; c) closure of authorized or registered installations. The text consists of 18 articles divided into 7 chapters as follows: General provisions (I); Operating license (II); Registration (III); Closure of installations (IV); Enforcement (V); Penalties (VI); Final provisions (VII).
Subject: Air & atmosphere, Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Alps, Europe, Western Europe
Entry into force notes: The present Ordinance enters into force on 1 August 2016.

Policy: Acuerdo Nº 24 - Normativa complementaria para la emisión de certificados de origen y verificación de mercancías de exportación.
Policy_Content: El presente Acuerdo expide la Normativa complementaria para la emisión de certificados de origen y verificación de mercancías de exportación. La normativa complementaria se refiere a las atribuciones y competencias, a tal propósito dispone que corresponde a la Subsecretaría de Servicios al Comercio Exterior, entre otras, habilitar e inhabilitar, según corresponda a entidades públicas y privadas, incluyendo la notificación a las autoridades gubernamentales competentes de los países contratantes conforme la normativa aplicable.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, South America, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Arrêté n° 14220-2016 du 5 juillet 2016 portant constitution de réserve foncière de l’Agence Nationale d’Appui au Logement et à l’Habitat (ANALOGH) pour ses projets de construction.
Policy_Content: Le présent arrêté met en place une réserve foncière (04ha 98a 31ca sise à Piste Avaratra, Fokontany d’Antsirabe Avaratra, Commune Urbaine d’Antsirabe I, Vakinakaratra) de l’Agence Nationale d’Appui au Logement et à l’Habitat (ANALOGH) pour ses projets de construction, en application de l’Article 38 de la loi n°2005-019 du 17 octobre 2005 fixant le principe régissant les statuts de terre.

Policy: Tier 4 Microfinance Institutions and Money Lenders Act.
Policy_Content: This Act provides rules for the micro-financing business in Uganda. The purpose of this Act is (I) To regulate tier 4 micro finance institutions by (a) facilitating the microfinance industry to promote social and economic development; (b) promoting legitimacy and building the confidence of members, customers and investors in the microfinance business; (c) establishing prudential standards for microfinance institutions in order to safeguard the deposits of members, prevent financial system instability of the funds of depositors and ensure stability of the financial system; and (d) applying non-prudential standards to tier 4 microfinance institutions by(i) defining sources of capital; (ii) establishing default protection mechanisms; (iii) enforcing compliance with generally accepted accounting practices; and (iv) instituting mechanisms for the prevention of fraud and financial crimes (II) To provide a regulatory framework for the management and control of money lending business. For the purposes of this Act, tier 4 micro finance institutions shall comrise (a) Savings and Credit Cooperative; (b) non deposit taking microfinance institutions; ( c) self help groups; and ( d) community based microfinance institutions.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Keyword: Agricultural development,Credit,Community management,Non-governmental entity,Financial agricultural measures
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Eastern Africa, Landlocked Developing Countries, Least Developed Countries

Policy: Décret D/2016/206/PRG/SGG du 05 juillet 2016, portant application du code des investissements.

Spécifiquement, il définit la procédure d'accès aux avantages du code des investissements ; le cadre institutionnel pour l'application du code des investissements (Ministère en charge de la Promotion du Secteur Privé, l'Agence de Promotion des Investissements Privés : Décret/2014/029/PRG/SGG, et le Comité Technique de Suivi des Investissements).

Policy: Order No. 476n of the Ministry of Health validating the Regulation on keeping consolidated register of genetically modified organisms and produce obtained with the use of genetically modified organisms or containing such organisms and on the procedure of insertion of information related thereto in the consolidated register of genetically modified organisms.
Policy_Content: This Order establishes the procedure for keeping consolidated register of genetically modified organisms and produce obtained with the use of genetically modified organisms or containing such organisms and on the procedure of insertion of information related thereto in the consolidated register of genetically modified organisms. The Register must contain the following information: (a) registration number and the name of GMO; (b) full name and location of the applicant; (c) information on types of uses of GMO and terms and conditions (if applicable); (d) data on testing organizations; (e) data on cancellation of certificate of state registration of GMO; and (f) registration number and type of produce obtained with the use of GMO.
Subject: Environment gen., Food & nutrition
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Resolución Nº 168-2016-MINAM ─ Guías para la elaboración de reportes anuales de gases de efecto invernadero y la difusión del inventario nacional de gases de efecto invernadero.
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución aprueba las Guías para la elaboración de reportes anuales de gases de efecto invernadero y la difusión del inventario nacional de gases de efecto invernadero: Guía Nº 1: Elaboración del Reporte Anual de Gases de Efecto Invernadero - Sector Energía. Categorías: Combustión Estacionaria y Emisiones Fugitivas; Guía Nº 2: Elaboración del Reporte Anual de Gases de Efecto Invernadero - Sector Energía. Categoría: Combustión Móvil; Guía Nº 3: Elaboración del Reporte Anual de Gases de Efecto Invernadero - Sector Procesos Industriales y Uso de Productos. Categorías: Industria de los Minerales, Industria Química e Industria de los Metales; Guía Nº 4: Elaboración del Reporte Anual de Gases de Efecto Invernadero - Sector Desechos. Categoría: Disposición de Residuos Sólidos; Guía Nº 5: Elaboración del Reporte Anual de Gases de Efecto Invernadero - Sector Desechos. Categorías: Tratamiento y Eliminación de Aguas Residuales Domésticas; Guía Nº 6: Elaboración del Reporte Anual de Gases de Efecto Invernadero - Sector Desechos. Categoría: Efluentes Industriales; Guía Nº 7: Elaboración del Reporte Anual de Gases de Efecto Invernadero - Sector Agricultura. Categorías: Fermentación Entérica, Manejo del Estiércol, Cultivos de Arroz, Suelos Agrícolas, Quema de Sabanas (pastos) y Quema de Residuos Agrícolas; Guía Nº 8: Elaboración del Reporte Anual de Gases de Efecto Invernadero - Sector Uso del Suelo, Cambio del Uso de Suelo y Silvicultura. Categorías: Cambios en Biomasa y otros Stocks Leñosos, Conversión de Bosques y Praderas, Abandono de Tierras Cultivadas, Emisiones y Absorciones en el Suelo y otros (gases no CO2); y Guía Nº 9: Difusión del Inventario Nacional de Gases de Efecto Invernadero.
Subject: Air & atmosphere, Environment gen., Water

Les territoires des communes ou parties de communes tels qu'ils figurent à l'annexe du présent arrêté sont classés en zone de montagne au titre de l'article D. 113-14 du code rural et de la pêche maritime.

Policy: Hineuru Claims Settlement Act 2016 (No. 33 of 2016).
Policy_Content: The purpose of this Act, consisting of 135 sections, divided into three Parts and completed by four Schedules, is: to record in English and te reo Māori the acknowledgements and apology given by the Crown to Hineuru in the deed of settlement; and to give effect to certain provisions of the deed of settlement that settles the historical claims of Hineuru. Part 1 provides for: the effect of the settlement of the historical claims on the jurisdiction of a court, tribunal, or other judicial body in respect of the historical claims; a consequential amendment to the Treaty of Waitangi Act 1975; the effect of the settlement on certain memorials; the exclusion of the law against perpetuities; and access to the deed of settlement.
Subject: Land & soil
Keyword: Drainage/land reclamation,Land tenure,Ownership,Dispute settlement,Legal proceedings/administrative proceedings,Traditional rights/customary rights,Cultural heritage,Indigenous peoples
Geographical_area: ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Australia and New Zealand, Oceania, South Pacific
Entry into force notes: This Act enters into force on 5 July 2016.

Policy: Presidential Decree No. 253 “On arrangements for financial recovery of agricultural organizations”.
Policy_Content: The scope of this Presidential Decree shall be to prevent financial bankruptcy of agricultural organizations and elaboration of recommendations and proposals for prejudicial financial recovery thereof. Recommendations shall be elaborated subject to prior submittal of financial recovery business plans. Competent state bodies and organizations shall be entitled, by the outcome of business plan performance, to cancel agricultural organizations from the list of agricultural organizations subject to prejudicial financial recovery and insertion thereof in the list of agricultural organizations subject to procedure of economic insolvency (bankruptcy).
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Keyword: Financial agricultural measures,Fiscal and market measures
Geographical_area: CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA
Entry into force notes: This Presidential Decree enters into force on the date of signature.

Policy: Décret D/2016/205/PRG/SGG du 04 juillet 2016, portant création, attributions, organisation et fonctionnement de l'agence nationale de sécurité sanitaire.
Policy_Content: Le présent décret crée l'Agence Nationale de Sécurité Sanitaire (ANSS) et définit ses attributions, son organisation et son fonctionnement. La mission de l’ANSS consiste à la mise en œuvre des orientations stratégiques du Ministère de la Santé en matière de Sécurité Sanitaire. A ce titre, elle est particulièrement chargée de : mettre en œuvre les textes d'orientation opérationnelle sur la Sécurité Sanitaire du Ministère de la Santé, plus spécifiquement : un plan d'intervention pour les urgences ; participer au renforcement des capacités du personnel en matière de surveillance et de prise en charge; veiller à l'aménagement des espaces de mise en observation/quarantaine conforment aux mesures spécifiques requises; veiller au développement d'un système national de surveillance des risques sanitaires ; contribuer à la mise en place d'un système national de surveillance et de réponse aux épidémies, urgences catastrophes; participer à l'élaboration de la cartographie des risques sanitaires à travers le territoire national ; promouvoir le développement des systèmes d'alerte précoce idoine; participer à la riposte publique à toute menace attentatoire à la sécurité humaine, animale et environnementale; et veiller à l'application du Règlement Sanitaire International.
Subject: Livestock, Environment gen.
Keyword: Institution,Public health,Risk assessment/management,Disasters,Early warning system/emergency intervention system,Animal health
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Least Developed Countries, North Atlantic, Western Africa

Policy: Order No. 31n of the Federal Agency of Scientific Institutions of the Russian Federation validating the Regulation on the state nature reserve "Ussuriysk" named after VL. Komarov of the Far Eastern Branch of the Russian Academy of Sciences.
Policy_Content: This Order establishes that the state nature reserve "Ussuriysk" named after VL. Komarov of the Far Eastern Branch of the Russian Academy of Sciences shall be constituted in the Primorie region and it shall be administered by the Federal Agency of Scientific Institutions of the Russian Federation. The state nature reserve "Ussuriysk" named after VL. Komarov of the Far Eastern Branch of the Russian Academy of Sciences shall perform the following functions: (a) the protection of natural areas in order to conserve biological diversity and maintain in a natural state protected natural complexes and objects; (b) the organization and performance of scientific research, including keeping and updating of the Annals of Nature; (c) performance of state environmental monitoring; (d) environmental education and development of cognitive tourism; and (e) assistance in the training of scientific personnel and specialists in the field of environmental protection. On the territory of the reserve, any activity shall be prohibited any activity that contradicts the objectives of the state nature reserve and the regime for its special protection, including: (a) commercial, artisanal and sport hunting; (b) commercial fisheries; (c) stay with firearms, pneumatic and throwing weapons, and hunting gear; (d) exploration of minerals and mining; (e) soil disturbance; (f) activities that entail changes in the hydrological regime of land; (g) procurement of soft resin; (h) clear cutting of forests; (i) timber extraction and harvesting of non-timber products; (j) transit passage and grazing of cattle; (k) plowing of land, with the exception of measures for forest firefighting; (l) haymaking, except for ensuring fire safety; (m) explosive works; (n) burning of vegetation and grassland fires, except for case of extinguishing forest fires; (o) water logging; (p) introduction of alien species; (q) transit and stay of motor vehicles; (r) stay with dogs, except for service dogs; (s) flight of aircraft and helicopters below 2000 meters above the territory of the reserve; and (t) disturbance and feeding of wild fauna species by the visitors.
Subject: Environment gen., Forestry, Wild species & ecosystems
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Order No. 32n of the Federal Agency of Scientific Institutions of the Russian Federation validating the Regulation on the state nature reserve “Ilmen”.
Policy_Content: This Order establishes that the state nature reserve “Ilmen” shall be located in the Chelyabinsk region and it shall be administered by the Federal Agency of Scientific Institutions of the Russian Federation. The state nature reserve “Ilmen” shall perform the following functions: (a) the protection of natural areas in order to conserve biological diversity and maintain in a natural state protected natural complexes and objects; (b) the organization and performance of scientific research, including keeping and updating of the Annals of Nature; (c) performance of state environmental monitoring; (d) environmental education and development of cognitive tourism; and (e) assistance in the training of scientific personnel and specialists in the field of environmental protection. On the territory of the reserve, any activity shall be prohibited any activity that contradicts the objectives of the state nature reserve and the regime for its special protection, including: (a) commercial, artisanal and sport hunting; (b) commercial fisheries; (c) stay with firearms, pneumatic and throwing weapons, and hunting gear; (d) exploration of minerals and mining; (e) soil disturbance; (f) activities that entail changes in the hydrological regime of land; (g) procurement of soft resin; (h) clear cutting of forests; (i) timber extraction and harvesting of non-timber products; (j) transit passage and grazing of cattle; (k) plowing of land, with the exception of measures for forest firefighting; (l) haymaking, except for ensuring fire safety; (m) explosive works; (n) burning of vegetation and grassland fires, except for case of extinguishing forest fires; (o) water logging; (p) introduction of alien species; (q) transit and stay of motor vehicles; (r) stay with dogs, except for service dogs; (s) flight of aircraft and helicopters below 2000 meters above the territory of the reserve; and (t) disturbance and feeding of wild fauna species by the visitors.
Subject: Environment gen., Forestry, Wild species & ecosystems

Policy: Order No. 29n of the Federal Agency of Scientific Organizations validating the Regulation on the Federal State Budgetary Scientific Institution Botanical Garden-Institute of Ufa Scientific Center as protected natural area of federal significance.
Policy_Content: This Order validates the Regulation on the Federal State Budgetary Scientific Institution Botanical Garden-Institute of Ufa Scientific Center as protected natural area of federal significance (located in Republic of Bashkortostan) defines tasks, scientific profile of the institution as dendrological, legal status, organizational structure and applicable protection regime. Scientific profile of the institution shall be botanical. The main purpose of the Federal State Budgetary Scientific Institution Botanical Garden-Institute of Ufa Scientific Center shall be performance of fundamental scientific research and applied developments in the field of botany, ecology, forestry, nature protection. The main tasks of the Federal State Budgetary Scientific Institution Botanical Garden-Institute of Ufa Scientific Center  shall be as follows: (a) introduction into cultivation of new species, forms and varieties of woody and herbaceous plants (rare and endangered species, ornamental, medicinal, fruit and berry, forest-forming, tropical and subtropical) valuable and promising botanically and (or) economically, introduction study of their biological and ecological characteristics in new conditions of growth, development on this basis of methods of adaptation (acclimatization), reproduction and cultivation thereof with the use of biotechnological methods; (b) creation of specialized scientific collections of plants, expositions, nurseries, experimental sites, herbaria; (c) improvement, maintenance and expansion of the unique collection fund of living plants in order to preserve biodiversity and enrich the flora; (d) study of natural flora and vegetation of the Southern Urals and other regions based on floristic, phytocenotic, silvicultural, population genetic, ecological research; (e) conducting field, expeditionary research of territories (including protected ones) with the purpose of identifying the biodiversity of flora and vegetation, patterns of spatial organization of vegetation cover, its population structure and anthropogenic dynamics, identification of plant species in need of protection, assessment of nature conservation significance of plant communities, development of measures for their protection and rational use; (f) study of the phenotypic and genetic diversity of plant species (including rare and endangered species), environmental monitoring of the state of plant communities, individual species and populations, synanthropization processes, introduction of alien species into natural ecosystems; (g) identification of potentially invasive species; (h) forecasting the evolutionary development of species and plant communities in the context of global climate change; (i) development of measures to preserve biodiversity and the gene pool of wild plants at population and phytocenotic level (especially rare and endangered species), identification of new protected natural areas (botanical natural monuments, reserves); (j) development and implementation of promising test methods for bioindication of environmental pollution; (k) identification of promising forms of plants for selection and introduction into culture, the creation of new varieties, development of biotechnology for propagation in vitro of valuable plants, reintroduction of rare species into natural communities, development of modern methods of landscape phytodesign, landscaping of territories, industrial and residential premises, ecological education; (l) preservation in artificial conditions of collections of living plants (especially rare and endangered species) and other botanical sites of great scientific, educational, economic and cultural value; (m) research work corresponding to the tasks of the Botanical garden-institute; and (n) performance of educational, pedagogical and scientific work in the field of botany and nature protection, plant growing and selection, ornamental gardening and landscape architecture.
Subject: Environment gen., Forestry
Keyword: Institution,Protected area,Ecosystem preservation,Biotechnology,Climate change,Research,Education,Monitoring,Forest management/forest conservation,Forest species,Plant protection,Genetic resources,Alien species
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Order No. 33n of the Federal Agency of Scientific Organizations validating the Regulation on the Federal State Budgetary Scientific Institution “Scientific Research Institute of Agriculture of South-East” as protected natural area of federal significance.
Policy_Content: This Order validates the Regulation on the Federal State Budgetary Scientific Institution “Scientific Research Institute of Agriculture of South-East” as protected natural area of federal significance (located in Saratov) defines tasks, scientific profile of the institution as dendrological, legal status, organizational structure and applicable protection regime. The main purpose of the Federal State Budgetary Scientific Institution “Scientific Research Institute of Agriculture of South-East” shall be preserving diversity and enriching flora, as well as the implementation of scientific, educational and educational activities. The main tasks of the Federal State Budgetary Scientific Institution “Scientific Research Institute of Agriculture of South-East” shall be as follows: (a) formation, preservation, reproduction and maintenance of a collection of plants with great scientific, educational, economic and cultural significance; (b) performance of research work on the problems of plant introduction and acclimatization, ecology and rational use of natural resources; (c) performance of scientific and educational and pedagogical work of ecological and botanical focus for students, schoolchildren, specialized professionals and the population; and (d) development of recommendations for a range of promising economically valuable and decorative species for use in forest reclamation and greenery plantings.
Subject: Environment gen., Forestry
Keyword: Institution,Protected area,Ecosystem preservation,Drainage/land reclamation,Research,Education,Forest management/forest conservation,Plant protection

Scientific profile of the institution shall be dendrological. The main purpose of the Federal State Budgetary Scientific Institution “Stavropol Scientific Research Institute of Agriculture” shall be preserving diversity and enriching flora, as well as the implementation of scientific, educational and educational activities. The main tasks of the Federal State Budgetary Scientific Institution “Stavropol Scientific Research Institute of Agriculture”  shall be as follows: (a) preservation and enrichment of collections of native and exotic plants; (b) performance of introductory research of botanical species in the conditions of the Stavropol region; (c) environmental monitoring; (d) implementation of educational and pedagogical activities in the field of botany and nature protection; and (e) preservation of monuments of landscape architecture.

Policy_Content: This Federal Law gives definition of navigation in the inland waterways, piloting of vessels, icebreaking, use of vessels for hydrotechnical work and other activities related to inland water transport. It also classifies inland waterways as surface waterbodies fir for navigation within their natural, artificial or conventional boundaries”.

Policy: Federal Law No. 353-FZ amending Federal Law No. 7-FZ on environmental protection and some other legislative acts in relation to forest park green belts.
Policy_Content: This Federal Law introduces the concept of forest park green belts. These shall be considered areas with a limited regime of nature management and other economic activities, which include "the territories on which the forests are located and the territories of the green fund within the boundaries of urban areas that are adjacent to these forests or constitute a single natural ecological system". The order of creation of such belts, the regime of special protection of natural objects located therein, as well as the features of timber extraction by cutting trees and other vegetation or other plantations in forest park green belts and the procedure for their compensation are determined. The administrative responsibility for violation of the regime of economic and other activities in the forest park green belt has been established.
Subject: Environment gen., Forestry
Keyword: Protected area,Ecosystem preservation,Urban land,Offences/penalties,Timber,Timber extraction/logging,Forest management/forest conservation

Policy: Federal Law No. 354-FZ amending some legislative acts.
Policy_Content: This Federal Law establishes new grounds and procedures for compulsory termination, as well as the specific features of acquiring, rights to plots of agricultural land. A land plot may be expropriated from the owner in a judicial procedure if it has not been used for 3 or more years to perform agricultural or other activities related to agricultural production. This time period does not include the time required for the development of the site, as well as the time during which it could not be used for its intended purpose because of natural disasters or in the presence of other circumstances that exclude such use. The site is also withdrawn if it is used with violations of the legislation of the Russian Federation, which resulted in a significant decrease in the soil fertility of agricultural land or caused damage to the environment. A plot cannot be expropriated if it is a subject of a mortgage or a bankruptcy case has been initiated against its owner. The legal regime of plots of agricultural land has been clarified. For example, such plots located within the boundaries of rural settlements or at a distance of no more than 30 kilometers from their borders cannot be used for purposes not related to agriculture. Sites of agricultural land that are state or municipal property are leased for a period of up to five years to peasant farms, agricultural organizations participating in state support programs in the field of agricultural development, for agricultural production or other activities related to agricultural production, without bidding. The Code of the Russian Federation on Administrative Offenses is amended to clarify the rules that establish administrative responsibility for the non-use of agricultural land for its intended use or its use in violation of Russian legislation.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Land & soil
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Federal Law No. 337-FZ amending Federal Law No. 66-FZ on farming, gardening, housing non-profit-making associations.
Policy_Content: This Federal Law links the amount of payment of membership fees of farming, gardening, and housing non-profit-making associations to the land area allotted to the member of farming, gardening, and housing non-profit-making associations. It also specifies the modalities of registration of members of farming, gardening, housing non-profit-making associations.

Policy: Federal Law No. 336-FZ amending Federal Law No. 101-FZ on turnover of agricultural land.
Policy_Content: This Federal Law establishes the right of tenants of agricultural land plots pertaining to state or municipal ownership to buy out or to conclude a new lease contract for the land plot without bidding. This is possible if the authorized bodies do not have information about the infringement of the Russian legislation revealed during the state land supervision and unresolved violations related to land use.

Policy: Federal Law No. 237-FZ “On the state cadastre valuation”.
Policy_Content: This Federal Law regulates relations originating from state cadastre valuation of the territory of the Russian Federation. The state cadastre valuation is conducted on the basis of the principles of the uniformity of the methodology for determining cadastral value, the continuity of the updating of the information necessary for determining the cadastral value, independence and openness of state cadastral valuation procedures at each stage of their implementation, economic feasibility and verifiability of re-assessment of cadastral value. State cadaster valuation shall be performed by decision of the regional state executive body. The state cadastre valuation includes the following procedures: (a) decision-making on conducting a state cadastre valuation; (b) determining the cadastral value and drawing up a report on the results of the state cadastral valuation; (c) approval of the results of determining the cadastral value. To determine the cadastral value, shall be performed preparatory work, including the collection and processing of information necessary for determining the cadastral value.
Subject: Land & soil
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Federal Law No. 282-FZ amending Federal Law No. 81-FZ enacting the Mercantile Marine Code.
Policy_Content: The Mercantile Marine Code is supplemented with Chapter VII.1 "Sea Line Transportation", which introduces the concept of "sea line", defines the procedure for its registration and removal from the register of vessels. A system of preferences has been established for vessels of the sea line (the priority of harbor services in the seaport, privileges for the payment of harbour dues, etc.) In addition, undecked non-self-propelled vessels, the length of which does not exceed 12 meters, are included in the list of vessels not subject to state registration.
Subject: Environment gen., Sea, Water

Policy: Federal Law No. 254-FZ amending some legislative acts.
Policy_Content: This Federal Law envisages the possibility of organization of biosphere proving grounds on the territory of nature reserves. This Federal Law introduces the concept of accumulated damage to the environment - damages to the environment that arose as a result of past economic and other activities, the obligation to eliminate which was not met or were not fully implemented; objects of the accumulated damage to the environment - the territories and water areas on which the accumulated damage to the environment has been identified, capital construction objects and waste disposal sites that are the sources of accumulated damage to the environment.

Policy: Federal Law No. 334-FZ amending some legislative acts.
Policy_Content: This Federal Law establishes a new procedure for disposing of land plots, the state ownership of which is not delimited. So, the plots located on the territory of the rural settlement that is part of the municipal district and in the inter-settlement territories of the municipal district shall be allotted to citizens and legal entities by the local government of this municipal district, unless otherwise established by the current legislation. The changes were made to Article 13 "The content of land protection" and Article 14 "Use of land and land contaminated by chemicals, including radioactive, other substances and microorganisms" of the Land Code of the Russian Federation. It is established that the procedure for rehabilitation of polluted soil shall be set forth by the Government of the Russian Federation.
Subject: Land & soil

Policy: Federal Law No. 279-FZ amending Law No. 2395-I on subsoil.
Policy_Content: This Federal Law determines the criteria for classification of subsoil plots as subsoil plots of federal significance. It is established that from the list of subsoil plots of federal significance those that contain placer and technogenic deposits of diamonds and metals of the platinum group are excluded, as well as manifestations of certain minerals. The procedure for granting the right to extract associated minerals and the procedure for making appropriate changes to previously issued licenses for the right to use subsoil plots is determined.

Policy: Federal Law No. 255-FZ amending Federal Law No.117-FZ on safety of waterworks.
Policy_Content: This Federal Law introduces the classification of waterworks, depending on the consequences of possible accidents, the criteria for which are set by the Government of the Russian Federation. The modalities and criteria for mandatory declaration of safety of waterworks are specified.

Policy: Federal Law No. 268-FZ amending Federal Law 35-FZ on electric energy.
Policy_Content: This Federal Law is aimed at stimulating the use of peat in the energy sector in a manner similar to other renewable energy sources. In particular, regulated prices for electricity produced at generating facilities operating on the basis of peat are established and purchased by territorial grid companies to compensate for electricity losses in electric networks. In addition, it is possible to subsidize the cost of technological connection to the power grid of power plants with an installed capacity of up to 25 megawatts, using peat as fuel.
Subject: Energy

Policy: Federal Law No. 335-FZ amending Land Code (No. 136-FZ of 2001).
Policy_Content: This Federal Law specifies the powers of local governments to implement municipal land control. According to the law, local self-government bodies of the municipal district exercise control over objects of land relations located on the inter-settlement territory of the municipal district. In addition, they control the objects of land relations located within the boundaries of the rural settlements that make up this district, except in cases where, in accordance with the regional legislation, these powers are assigned to the local self-government bodies of the aforesaid rural settlements.
Subject: Land & soil

Policy: Action Plan for China's Forestry Sector in Adaptation to the Climate Change (2016-2020).
Policy_Content: Action Plan for China's Forestry Sector in Adaption to the Climate Change (2016-2020) is a sectoral policy document. Main objectives are: By 2020, the ability of forests, wetlands and desert ecosystems to adapt to climate change will be increased markedly; the forestry adaptation to climate change will be carried out in an all-round way, the awareness of adaptation will be generally improved and the basic capabilities will be further strengthened.

Policy: Presidential Decree No. 2189 on measures to improve the supply of irrigation water in arable lands and to meet the need for potable water of population.
Policy_Content: In order to improve irrigation efficiency in arable lands and to meet the need for safe drinking water of population, measures shall be taken and water reservoirs, water channels and other water facilities shall be brought into use. The Azerbaijan Amelioration and Water Management Open Joint Stock Company shall be financed by the State for drilling new artesian wells to meet the needs. The list of planned artesian wells and the districts in which wells will be drilled is attached to this Decree.

Policy: Ministry of Agriculture and Fisheries Corporate Plan July 2016-June 2020
Policy_Content: The Ministry of Agriculture and Fisheries Corporate Plan 2016 - 2020 of Samoa was prepared based on the Agriculture Sector Plan 2016 – 2020, with a strong emphasis on a Sector Wide Approach (SWAp), to achieve its’ four broad End of Sector Plan Outcomes (ESPO), as stipulated in the Agriculture Sector Plan 2016 – 2020, and in support of the Strategy for the Development of Samoa (SDS) 2012 - 2016. Successful implementation of this plan will contribute to achieving the national vision of improved quality of life for all and to advancing Samoa’s attainment of the global Sustainable Development Goals (SOG’s). The Goal for the Agriculture Sector Plan 2016 – 2020 is “To increase Food and Nutrition, and Income Security”. The Agriculture Sector Plan provides a framework to guide programs and actions from all key stakeholders to achieve this goal. The Ministry’s Corporate Plan 2016 - 2020 is expected to provide coherent programs and actions that will lead the Sector towards achieving this goal, in partnership with its stakeholders, and especially the private sector, non-government organisations and development partners.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Food & nutrition, Fisheries
Geographical_area: ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Oceania, Polynesia, Small Island Developing States, South Pacific

Policy: Décret n° 2016-586/PRES/PM/MDNAC/MATDSI/MAECBE/MINEFID du 01 juillet 2016 portant création, organisation et fonctionnement du mécanisme national d’alerte précoce et de réponse aux risques sécuritaires.
Policy_Content: Le présent décret met en place un Mécanisme National d’Alerte Précoce et de Réponse aux Risques Sécuritaires ayant pour missions, entre autres, de : lutter contre des menaces liées aux changements climatiques et aux catastrophes naturelles; recueillir les informations et les données sur les menaces à la bonne gouvernance, à la sécurité et à la paix au Burkina Faso; alerter le Gouvernement sur les menaces potentielles; suggérer au Gouvernement les réponses adaptées aux menaces identifiées ; lutter contre toute maladie à déclaration obligatoire dont le syndrome Ebola ; suivre et/ou coordonner la mise en œuvre des réponses arrêtées par le Gouvernement ainsi que celles portées par des organisations régionales et sous-régionales.
Subject: Environment gen.
Keyword: Early warning system/emergency intervention system,Risk assessment/management,Institution

Policy: Vision 2036: Achieving Prosperity for All.
Policy_Content: The Vision 2036 is a national policy with a multi-sectoral approach. The timeframe of the Plan is 20 years between 2016 and 2036. The purpose of the Vision is the achievement and fulfilment of individuals, community and national goals at all levels by ensuring sustainable economic development, human and social development, sustainable environment and governance, peace and security.

The Measures consist of 17 Articles.

Policy: Loi n°2016-021 Sur les Poles Anti-Corruption.
Policy_Content: La présente loi a pour objectif de créer, au sein du système judiciaire pénal, des juridictions spécialisées dénommées « Pôles Anti-Corruption » en abrégé PAC, afin qu’elles se substituent aux Chaines pénales anti-corruption, dont le déficit de cadre juridique, simplement régi par une circulaire interministérielle depuis 2004, posait des difficultés sur le plan juridictionnel et administratif. Au demeurant, l’insuffisante efficacité des actuelles Chaînes pénales anti-corruption nécessite une approche différente de la lutte contre la corruption, permettant une implication coordonnée de l’ensemble des acteurs de lutte contre la corruption, et associant la société civile.
Subject: General

Policy: Regional Law No. 87 “On industrial policy”.
Policy_Content: This Regional Law regulates relations originating between subjects operating in the sphere of industry, regional and state bodies and local self-government in the process of formation and implementation of industrial policy. The tasks of industrial policy shall be as follows: (a) formation and development of modern industry; (b) stimulation of industrial activity; (c) increase of industrial production output; (d) promotion of innovations and research in industry; (e) application of best available industrial technologies and methods; and ensuring technological independence of the regional economy. Particular attention shall be paid to promotion of inter-regional and international cooperation in various branches of industry.

Policy: Special Economic Zones Regulations 2016 (L.N. No. 147 of 2016).
Policy_Content: These Regulations implement provisions of the Special Economic Zones Act and concern the designation and administration of special economic zones. They also provide with respect to environmental impact assessment, land use planning, sustainable development and prohibition and monitoring of activities within designated zone that have an impact on the environment. A proposal for the designation of an area as a special economic zone may be submitted by any person to the Special Economic Zones Authority. it must include strategic environmental and social-impact assessment in made  accordance with these Regulations.  The Authority shall monitor or prohibit certain activities affecting the environment. Also the National Environment Management Authority is involved in permits, waivers, monitoring, inspections, audits and enforcement. The National Environment Management Authority or the Authority shall issue environmental permits to authorize certain activities under the Act and may publish a list of activities that do not require special economic zone environmental permits. The National Environment Management Authority, in consultation with the Authority, shall have the power to designate protected areas within special economic zones to protect water supplies, bio diversity or other environmental resources.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Environment gen., Land & soil, Water
Keyword: Zoning,EIA,Sustainable development,Land-use planning,Freshwater quality/freshwater pollution,Water conservation zone,Pollution control
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Eastern Africa

Policy: Maritime Transport (Oil Pollution Levies) Order 2016.
Policy_Content: These regulations, consisting of 30 sections and one Schedule, establish the Maritime Transport (Oil Pollution Levies). The levies imposed by this order are oil pollution levies intended generally to provide money for the New Zealand Oil Pollution Fund to be applied by it for the purposes set out in section 331(1) of the Act. The levies described as capability levies are imposed particularly to support expenditures for the purposes set out in section 331(1)(b) of the Act and, more particularly, to support New Zealand’s oil pollution response capability or oil pollution response systems including capital expenditures to purchase or upgrade oil pollution response equipment. The Schedule specifies Rates of levy.
Subject: Environment gen., Sea
Geographical_area: ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Australia and New Zealand, Oceania, South Pacific
Entry into force notes: This Order enters into force on 1 January 2017.

Policy: Regulation amending the Regulation on plant quarantine and fumigation.
Policy_Content: This Regulation amends Article 3 as “This Regulation implements the Law No. 5996 on veterinary services, plant health, food and feed and the Decree Law No. 639 on the establishment and functions of the Ministry of Food, Agriculture and Livestock” and accordingly amends Article 21 as “The provisions of this Regulation are governed by the Minister of Food, Agriculture and Livestock”. This Regulation adds several definitions in Article 4. Furthermore, this Regulation amends Paragraph 1 of Article 5 required qualifications to be fumigation operator, Paragraph 1 of Article 6 regarding training personnel about fumigation and Annex-I, Annex-II, Annex-III and Annex-V. This Regulation adds Paragraph 2 in Article 12 as “Fumigation operator forest engineers, forestry industry engineers and fumigation operator assistant forest technicians shall carry out fumigation activities regarding plant products and industrial plant products obtained from forest plants in forest areas or in other areas”.

Policy: Regulations concerning the introduction of the Bremnes model as test scheme for Norwegian salmon and trout farming
Policy_Content: This Regulation of the Department of Food and Fisheries introduces the BREMNES model for biomass sustainability as a test scheme for valuation of aquaculture projects in the framework of sustainable development of the aquaculture industry along the caost of Norway. The Regulation applies to commercial permits for salmon farming, trout and rainbow trout in sea water, as well as permits for development purposes. The Directorate of Fisheries shall prepare announcements and other documentation for use application and management of the scheme. The county municipality in the county for which the permit is requested shall process the application and make a decision regarding the application for participation in the scheme. The Directorate of Fisheries shall be the appeal body.

Policy: Decreto Ley Nº 337 - Ley de la Protección contra las Prácticas Desleales en materia de Propiedad Industrial.
Policy_Content: El presente Decreto Ley, que consta de 12 artículos divididos en cuatro Capítulos, establece las normas para la protección contra las prácticas desleales en la industria y el comercio en materia de Propiedad Industrial; así como para proteger la información no divulgada legítimamente bajo el control de personas naturales y jurídicas, y determinados datos de prueba depositados en las autoridades reguladoras que aprueban la comercialización de productos farmacéuticos o químicos agrícolas que  utilizan nuevas entidades químicas. Las disposiciones de este Decreto Ley se aplican a las prácticas desleales en materia de propiedad industrial realizadas a través de cualquier medio, por personas naturales o jurídicas, siempre que tengan lugar en el ejercicio de actividades industriales o comerciales y produzcan o puedan producir los efectos que se establecen en la presente norma. Se considera práctica desleal en materia de Propiedad Industrial todo acto contrario a los usos y prácticas honestas en la industria y el comercio, siempre que produzcan o puedan producir efectos sustanciales en la promoción y ofrecimiento de productos o servicios en el mercado nacional a favor del comisor de las prácticas tipificadas o de un tercero.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Environment gen., Cultivated plants
Keyword: Legal proceedings/administrative proceedings,Authorization/permit,Business/industry/corporations,Contract/agreement,Integrated pest management-IPM/pest management strategies,Fraud/deceit/adulteration,Public health,Pesticides
Geographical_area: Americas, Caribbean, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North Atlantic, Small Island Developing States
Entry into force notes: El presente Decreto Ley entra en vigor a partir de los 60 días posteriores a la fecha de su publicación en la Gaceta Oficial de la República de Cuba.

Policy: Decreto Ley Nº 336 - Ley de las Disposiciones Contractuales de Propiedad Industrial en los Negocios Jurídicos.
Policy_Content: El presente Decreto Ley, que consta de 25 artículos divididos en six Capítulos, tiene por objeto establecer las normas relativas a las disposiciones contractuales de propiedad industrial que se deben incluir en los negocios jurídicos para la adquisición de tecnología y en los acuerdos de colaboración económica y científico-técnica, e identificar disposiciones contractuales restrictivas que impiden, limitan o distorsionan abusiva o injustificadamente el desempeño industrial y comercial. El presente Decreto-Ley se aplica a los negocios jurídicos donde se adquiere tecnología de una parte extranjera por personas naturales y jurídicas, nacionales y extranjeras con domicilio o establecimiento industrial o comercial real y efectivo en la República de Cuba. Además, se aplica a los negocios jurídicos para la adquisición de tecnología entre personas nacionales. Los negocios jurídicos comprendidos en el presente Decreto-Ley son aquellos que conllevan la concertación de: a) Contratos de licencia y de cesión para la adquisición de tecnología no incorporada, basados en solicitudes o derechos de propiedad industrial o en información no divulgada, o en ambos; b) contratos para la adquisición de tecnología incorporada; c) acuerdos para la colaboración económica y científico-técnica. Los contratos de licencia que tienen por objeto la adquisición de tecnología no incorporada, protegida como información no divulgada, para su explotación industrial y comercial deben incluir disposiciones específicas.
Subject: Energy, Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Americas, Caribbean, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North Atlantic, Small Island Developing States
Entry into force notes: El presente Decreto Ley entra en vigor a partir de los 60 días posteriores a la fecha de su publicación en la Gaceta Oficial de la República de Cuba.

Policy: National Transparency, Integrity and Anti-Corruption Commission Law of 2016.
Policy_Content: This Law consisting of 32 articles at art.3 establishes the bodies subject to this Law. Article 4 lists the corrupt practices according to the Law. Article 5 establishes the Commission with the following main tasks (i) reinforce the principle of transparency in financial and administrative operations in order to achieve good administration and use of public finances; (ii) increase the accountability of each individual regardless of their position and disseminate the principles of equality and justice; (iii) prevent and combat corruption in all its forms, guarantee integrity in the work of the state and defend moral principles in political life and its social and economic collateral aspects; (iv) encourage to activate the role of civil society organizations and inform about the dangers and negative effects of corruption; (v) develop effective policies in the field of transparency, integrity and the fight against corruption; (vi) implement the commitments made by Sudan in international agreements; (vii) respect and increase the right to obtain information relating to corruption and lack of transparency; (viii) increase social participation and implement the principle of the sovereignty of law and correct administration; (ix) cooperate with states, regional and international organizations in the field of transparency and the fight against corruption.
Subject: General
Geographical_area: Africa, Landlocked Developing Countries, Least Developed Countries, NEAR EAST AND NORTH AFRICA, Northern Africa, Red Sea  Gulf of Aden, Sahel
Entry into force notes: This Law enters into force on the date of its signature.

Policy: European Union (Framework for Maritime Spatial Planning) Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 352 of 2016).
Policy_Content: These Regulations give effect in Irish law to Directive No. 2014/89/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council establishing a framework for maritime spatial planning by establishing the necessary legal basis for the Minister to implement maritime spatial planning. The Regulations designate the Minister as the competent authority for the purposes of the Directive and provide the broad framework within which the Minister will implement maritime spatial planning. “Maritime spatial planning” means the process by which the competent authorities of Ireland duly analyse and organise human activities in marine areas to achieve ecological, economic and social objectives. When establishing and implementing maritime spatial planning, the competent authority concerned shall- for specified purposes have regard to, among other things - the economic, social and environmental aspects to support sustainable development and growth in the maritime sector and an ecosystem based approach. Specified purposes include the fisheries and aquaculture sectors and preserving, protecting and improving the environment, including resilience to climate change impacts.
Subject: Environment gen., Fisheries, Land & soil, Sea

Policy_Content: La presente Resolución aprueba el Reglamento de Organización y Funciones del Ministerio de Desarrollo e Inclusión Social (MIDIS), que ejerce la rectoría del Sector Desarrollo e Inclusión Social. El MIDIS es la entidad pública competente en las siguientes materias: a) Desarrollo social, superación de la pobreza y promoción de la inclusión y equidad social; y b) Protección social de poblaciones en situación de riesgo, vulnerabilidad y abandono.

Policy_Content: This Act amends the Utility Regulatory Authority Act 2004 in section 10; (a) in subsection (2), by repealing paragraph (a); (b) in subsection (3), by repealing paragraph (a). Policy: Order No. 375 of the Ministry of Natural Resources and Ecology validating the Regulation on reforestation.
Policy_Content: This Order establishes the modalities of reforestation with a view of restoration of deforested, destroyed and damaged forest areas. The scope of reforestation shall be restoration of forest plantations, conservation of biological diversity and conservation of environmental values of forests. Reforestation shall be performed in natural, artificial and combined (combination of natural and artificial reforestation) manner. Reforestation shall be performed on (a) forest plots allotted on lease for timber extraction; and (b) on other forest plots by state bodies and local government.
Subject: Forestry, Land & soil

Policy_Content: Le présent arrêté fixe les conditions et modalités de prise en charge de la concession des terrains relevant du domaine privé de l’Etat destinés à la réalisation de projets de promotion immobilière à caractère commercial consentie antérieurement au 4 novembre 2015, date de promulgation du décret exécutif n° 15-281 du 12 Moharram 1437 correspondant au 26 octobre 2015, en application des dispositions de l’article 15 du décret exécutif n° 15-281 du 12 Moharram 1437 correspondant au 26 octobre 2015 fixant les conditions et modalités de concession convertible en cession des terrains relevant du domaine privé de l’Etat destinés à la réalisation de projets de promotion immobilière à caractère commercial.

Policy: National Energy Efficiency and Conservation Act, 2016 (No. XXX).
Policy_Content: This Act, consisting of 28 sections, creates the National Energy Efficiency and Conservation. It establishes composition, duties and responsibilities of the above mentioned Authority, entitled to: a) serve as a focal Federal authority for carrying out and coordinating the implementation of all energy conservation programmes in all sectors of economy; b) manage, implement and enforce the provisions; c) prepare or update national energy conservation policy for the approval of the Board; d) prepare draft regulations to be made by the Board pursuit to the provisions of this Act; e) recommend national energy efficiency standards to the Board and after approval by the National Standards Body ensure implementation of these standards; t) coordinate energy conservation policies and programmes nationally and internationally; g) establish protocols of coordination between relevant functionaries of the Government and serve as the information house on energy conservation and management: h) initiate demonstration, research and development programmes in support of its functions; i) establish, infrastructure and take appropriate institutional development and capacity building measures for effective implementation; j) establish systems and procedures for surveys, monitoring and audit to prevent the inefficient use of energy resources and recommend implementation of specific energy conservation measures; k) establish and maintain accredited laboratories for conducting analysis to help the Authority performing its functions and conducting research in various areas of energy conservation; l) seek information or data relevant to its functions; m) recommend the adoption of financial and fiscal incentives or schemes for achieving energy conservation objectives; n) request for foreign technical and financial assistance, etc.
Subject: Energy
Geographical_area: Asia, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Indian Ocean, South Asian Seas, Southern Asia
Entry into force notes: This Act enters into force at once.

Policy_Content: This Regulation amends Article 15/1/b as “Article 7 and 8 regarding reporting and verification of greenhouse gas emissions enter into force on 1 January 2017”. Furthermore, this Regulation adds the Provisional Clause 2 regarding submitting the GHG emission reports to the relevant Ministry.

Policy: Manam Resettlement Authority Act 2016 (No. 2 of 2016).
Policy_Content: This Act establishes the Manam Resettlement Authority, defines its duties and powers and provides with respect to its administration and operation. The Authority shall be a body corporate and shall identify and acquire land for the resettlement of displaced persons in Manam Island. and shall be instrumental in aid and resettlement of people affected by disaster in Manam. The Department of Provincial and Local-level Government Affairs shall monitor the performance of the Authority. The Authority shall be managed by a Board, which may be suspended by the National Executive Council if it incapable of effectively performing its functions or has not properly conducted its affairs.
Subject: Environment gen., Land & soil, Water
