Policy: Order No. 376 of the Ministry of Natural Resources and Ecology validating the Regulation on the national park “Valdai”.
Policy_Content: This Regulation establishes that the location of the national park “Valdai” shall be Novgorod region of the Russian Federation. National park “Valdai” shall perform the following tasks: (a) conservation of natural complexes, unique and reference natural sites and objects; (b) conservation of historical and cultural heritage; (c) environmental education of the population; (d) promotion of regulated tourism and recreation; (e) development and introduction of scientific methods of nature protection and environmental education; (f) implementation of state environmental monitoring; and (g) restoration of disturbed natural and historical-cultural complexes and objects. On the territory of the national park, shall be prohibited any activity that can damage natural complexes and objects of flora and fauna, cultural and historical objects and which contradicts the purposes and tasks of the national park, including: (a) exploration and mining; (b) disturbance of the soil cover and geological outcrops; (c) activities entailing changes in the hydrological regime; (d) allotment of land parcels for horticulture and smallholding; (e) construction of main roads, pipelines, power transmission lines and other communications, as well as construction and operation of economic and residential facilities, except for tourism industry facilities, museums and information centers, facilities related to the functioning of the national park and the functioning of settlement located within its boundaries; (f) logging (except for timber extraction by citizens for individual personal needs); (g) procurement of soft resin; (h) commercial hunting and commercial fisheries; (i) procurement of edible non-timber forest resources (with the exception of procurement by citizens of such resources for their own personal needs); (j) disturbance of natural habitats of wild fauna and wild flora species; (k) biological collections, except for research purposes, envisaged by thematic and research plans of the Institution; (l) introduction of living organisms in order to acclimatize them; (m) passage and grazing of domestic animals; (n) water logging; (o) organization of mass sports and entertainment events, organization of tourist camps and making bonfires outside the specially designated places for such purpose; (p) unauthorized conduct of archaeological excavations, collection and removal of objects of historical and cultural value; (q) stay with firearms, pneumatic and throwing weapons, including hunting firearms and hunting gear; (r) blasting operations; (s) burning of vegetation (with the exception of fire-fighting measures implemented in coordination with the Institution); (t) application of  chemicals, mineral fertilizers and nutrients; (u) washing vehicles on the banks of waterbodies; (v) movement and parking of motorized vehicles outside public roads and specially designated places (except for cases related to the functioning of the national park); (w) destruction and damage of posts, barriers, stands, boundary poles and other information signs, developed ecological paths and recreation areas, buildings on the territory of the national park, as well as property of the Institution, inscriptions and signs on boulders, outcrops and historical and cultural objects; (x) stay with dogs (except for service dogs, and hunting dogs for artisanal and sport hunting) and keeping unleashed dogs outside the cages or other structures that limit the zone of their movement, and training of dogs; and (y) haymaking (except for forest fire fighting purposes).
Subject: Forestry, Wild species & ecosystems
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Décret nº2016-801 Portant application de la loi n° 2015-056 du 03 février 2016 relative à la création de la «Chaine Spéciale de lutte contrôle trafic de bois de rose et/ou de bois d’ébène» et répression des infractions relatives aux bois de rose et aux bois d’ébène.
Policy_Content: Le présent décret fixe les modalités d’application de la loi n°2015-056 du 03 février 2016 portant création de la « Chaine spéciale de lutte contre le trafic de bois de rose et/ou de bois d’ébène » et la répression des infractions relatives aux bois de rose et aux bois d’ébène.  Il détermine les localités à forte sensibilité en matière de trafic de bois de rose et de bois d’ébène, la composition de la Brigade Mixte d’Enquête, les charges de fonctionnement des Brigades Mixtes d’Enquête, la détermination des lieux de dépôt des objets saisis, les modalités de rétribution des informateurs, les conditions d’habilitation pour une mission d’infiltration, les conditions d’établissement de la liste des assesseurs siégeant dans la juridiction spéciale mise en place à Antananarivo, la composition, l’attribution et le fonctionnement de la Commission de gestion des stocks, les modalités de transport des bois de rose et bois d’ébène saisis et confisqués, les modalités de répartition des produits de la vente des produits saisis et confisqués et les lignes d’utilisation des produits de la vente des produits saisis et confisqués.
Subject: Forestry, Wild species & ecosystems
Keyword: Timber extraction/logging,Authorization/permit,Legal proceedings/administrative proceedings,Forest species,International trade,Timber,Forest management/forest conservation,Trade in species,Use restrictions,Protection of species
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Eastern Africa, Indian Ocean, Least Developed Countries

Policy: Règlement du centre de formation professionnelle nature et environnement (RCFPNE)
Policy_Content: Le centre de formation professionnelle nature et environnement est un établissement de l'enseignement secondaire II au sens de l'article 84 de la loi sur l'instruction publique, du 17 septembre 2015. Il comprend: a) une école professionnelle au sens de l'article 21 de la loi fédérale sur la formation professionnelle, du 13 décembre 2002, qui dispense aux personnes en formation en entreprise, dans le cadre de l'enseignement obligatoire, un enseignement professionnel et un enseignement de culture générale; b) une école de métiers au sens de l'article 16, alinéa 2, lettre a, de la loi fédérale sur la formation professionnelle, du 13 décembre 2002, qui dispense aux personnes en formation en école à plein temps une formation à la pratique professionnelle et une formation scolaire permettant l'exercice de leur profession. Le centre est rattaché au pôle de formation nature et environnement.
Subject: Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Alps, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe

Policy: Convenio de Coordinación Marco que celebran la Secretaría de Medio Ambiente y Recursos Naturales, a través de la Comisión Nacional del Agua, y el Estado de Campeche, con el objeto de conjuntar recursos y formalizar acciones en materia de infraestructura hidroagrícola, de agua potable, alcantarillado y saneamiento, así como de cultura del agua, para fomentar el desarrollo regional en la entidad.
Policy_Content: Mediante el presente Convenio la Secretaría de Medio Ambiente y Recursos Naturales (a través de la Comisión Nacional del Agua) y el Estado de Campeche establecen las bases de coordinación para conjuntar recursos y formalizar acciones en materia de infraestructura hidroagrícola, de agua potable, alcantarillado y saneamiento, así como de cultura del agua para fomentar el desarrollo regional en la entidad. Las acciones previstas incluyen las siguientes: rehabilitar y modernizar la infraestructura hidroagrícola concesionada o de particulares, administradas por las organizaciones de usuarios de los distritos o unidades de riego y de distritos de temporal tecnificado; rehabilitar, modernizar, relocalizar o reponer pozos profundos de propiedad federal y de propiedad particular; adquisición y rehabilitación integral de maquinaria y equipo para la conservación de la infraestructura hidroagrícola concesionada o administrada por las organizaciones de usuarios en los distritos de riego y para nivelación de tierras; así como el equipamiento de talleres; capacitar y otorgar asistencia técnica para fomentar el uso eficiente del agua, así como en la conservación, modernización y administración de los bienes nacionales concesionados o de particulares, y en la consolidación de la gestión de las organizaciones de usuarios; tecnificar el riego de la agricultura controlada conforme a la normatividad que resulte aplicable y en su caso; recuperar los suelos ensalitrados y controlar malezas acuáticas en los cuerpos de agua de los distritos y unidades de riego y de temporal tecnificado; otorgar apoyos a los usuarios hidroagrícolas de las unidades de riego con aprovechamientos subterráneos y superficiales y a los propietarios de pozos particulares dentro de los distritos de riego, para la modernización y tecnificación de la infraestructura hidroagrícola.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Water
Keyword: Sub-national agreement,Agricultural development,Equipment,Irrigation,Freshwater resources management,Local government,Potable water,Sewerage,Water abstraction,Water desalination,Water supply,Water users' associations

Policy: Ley Orgánica de Ordenamiento Territorial, Uso y Gestión de Suelo.
Policy_Content: La presente Ley Orgánica de Ordenamiento Territorial, Uso y Gestión de Suelo, tiene por objeto fijar los principios y reglas generales que rigen el ejercicio de las competencias de ordenamiento territorial, uso y gestión del suelo urbano y rural, y su relación con otras que incidan significativamente sobre el territorio o lo ocupen, para que se articulen eficazmente, promuevan el desarrollo equitativo y equilibrado del territorio y propicien el ejercicio del derecho a la ciudad, al hábitat seguro y saludable, y a la vivienda adecuada y digna, en cumplimiento de la función social y ambiental de la propiedad e impulsando un desarrollo urbano inclusivo e integrador para el Buen Vivir de las personas, en concordancia con las competencias de los diferentes niveles de gobierno.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Land & soil

Policy: Ley Nº 9373 - Protección a los ocupantes de zonas clasificadas como especiales.
Policy_Content: La presente Ley de Protección a los ocupantes de zonas clasificadas como especiales, establece que por el plazo de veinticuatro meses se suspenderá el desalojo de personas, demolición de obras, actividades y proyectos en la zona marítima terrestre, zona fronteriza y patrimonio natural del Estado, salvo aquellas que sean ordenadas mediante resolución judicial o administrativa en firme, fundamentándose en la comisión de daño ambiental o cuando exista peligro o amenaza de daño al medio ambiente. Tal suspensión no excluye dictar las medidas cautelares judiciales o administrativas por las autoridades competentes, cuando se determine la comisión de daño ambiental o peligro o amenaza de daño al medio ambiente.

Policy: Cabinet Regulation No. 413 of 2016 on By-law of the Industrial Property Board of Appeal
Policy_Content: This Regulation approves the by-law of the Industrial Property Board of Appeal of Latvia. The Industrial Property Board of Appeal is a collegial decision-making institution appointed by the Cabinet which examines extrajudicial disputes regarding invention patents (including supplementary protection certificates for medicinal products and plant protection products), trademarks, designs, and topographies of semiconductor products arising from registration and post-registration procedures of the objects of industrial property. The Purpose of operation of the Board of Appeal is to examine extrajudicial disputes arising from registration and post-registration procedures, and also to ensure, in post-registration procedures, implementation of earlier rights provided for in the industrial property laws and regulations.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Food & nutrition, Cultivated plants

Policy: Loi portant modification de la Loi n°01-079 du 20 août 2001 portant Code pénal.
Policy_Content: Cette loi modifie certaines dispositions de la Loi n°01-079 du 20 août 2001 portant code pénal. En particulier il est inséré une section IX au niveau du Chapitre X : crimes et délits de nature économique et contre la chose publique. la nouvelle section concerne la corruption d’agents publicsétrangers et de fonctionnaires d’organisations internationales publiques, de la corruption et de la soustraction de biens dans le secteur privé, du recel du produit de l’une de ces infractions.
Subject: General

Policy: Ministerial Decision No. 41/2016 approving the Regulation of the Ministry of Public Works, Housing and Water Resources.
Policy_Content: This Resolution approves the Regulation of the Ministry of Public Works, Housing and Water Resources. This Regulation, consisting of 107 articles divided into three Chapters and several sections, regulates composition, duties and responsibilities of the above mentioned Ministry, as a central organ of the State that ensures the realization of the tasks of the Government in the areas of public works, building materials, roads and bridges, urbanization, housing, water resources, water supply and sanitation. The Regulation also creates the National Directorate of Water Resources Management, abbreviated as DNGRH, is an organic unit of this Ministry, responsible for promoting the sustainable use of water resources to meet current and future generations needs, safeguarding the environment. This Ministry in particular is entitled to: lead planning for the construction of public works, and ensuring the efficiency of investments; quality control of public works, ensuring their safety and sustainability; water supply systems, sanitation, protection and water storage; definition of the regime for designing, execution and supervision of public works; regulation of the use and quality control of materials and building components; implementation of policies and strategies for the exploitation and rational and sustainable use of water resources; water resources assessment, determining the needs within the river basin; provision of water in quantity and quality to meet the challenges of socio-economic development; management of water resources, ensuring its rational and sustainable use, and for preventing and mitigating the impacts of floods and droughts; implementation of policies and strategies for the expansion and improvement of water supply and sanitation services.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Environment gen., Water
Keyword: Institution,Legal proceedings/administrative proceedings,Irrigation,Agricultural development,Water quality standards,Waterworks,Pollution control,Research,Freshwater quality/freshwater pollution,Governance,Water supply,Sustainable use,Freshwater resources management

Policy: Ley Nº 30472 - Crea el Sistema de Mensajería de Alerta Temprana de Emergencias (SISMATE)
Policy_Content: La presente Ley dispone la creación, implementación, operación y mantenimiento del Sistema de Mensajería de Alerta Temprana de Emergencias (SISMATE), como ordenamiento centralizado de comunicación masiva cuya finalidad es orientar a la población, de forma sencilla y clara, así como de manera previa, concurrente y posterior a la ocurrencia de un desastre o una situación de emergencia o urgencia, utilizando canales de control, señalización, difusión y análogos de las redes y servicios públicos de telecomunicaciones.
Subject: Environment gen.

Policy: Loi concernant le soutien au développement durable des zones rurales.
Policy_Content: La présente loi vise à définir, conformément aux principes de la politique agricole commune, le cadre général en vue de promouvoir une agriculture multifonctionnelle, durable et compétitive, soucieuse de la protection de l’environnement et du climat, mettant l’accent sur l’innovation, en harmonie avec un développement intégré des zones rurales. Le texte comprend 82 articles répartis en 5 Partie comme suit: Champ d’application et définitions (I); Amélioration de la compétitivité du secteur agricole et renforcement de la viabilité des exploitations agricoles (II); Amélioration de la qualité de vie en milieu rural et diversification de l’économie rurale (III); Leader (IV); Dispositiones finales (V).
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Keyword: Agricultural development,Sustainable development,Sustainable use,Farming,Financial agricultural measures,Family farming,Agricultural land,Zoning,Agroecology,Cultural heritage

Policy: Loi concernant la mise à disposition sur le marché d’équipements radioélectriques.
Policy_Content: La présente loi établit un cadre réglementaire pour la mise à disposition sur le marché d’équipements radioélectriques et leur mise en service dans l’Union européenne. L’article 3 établit que les équipements radioélectriques sont construits de telle façon qu’ils garantissent: a) la protection de la santé et de la sécurité des personnes et des animaux domestiques, et la protection des biens, y compris les objectifs relatifs aux exigences en matière de sécurité figurant dans loi du 27 mai 2016 concernant lamise à disposition sur le marché du matériel électrique destiné à être employé dans certaines limites de tension, mais sans limites de tension. Le texte comprend 40 articles répartis en 6 chapitres comme suit: Dispositions générales (1); Obligations des opérateurs économiques (2); Conformité des équipements radioélectriques (3); Notification des organismes d’évaluation de la conformité (4); Surveillance du marché de l’Union européenne, contrôle des équipements sous pression et des ensembles entrant sur le marché de l’Union européenne et  procédure de sauvegarde de l’Union européenne (5); Dispositions transitoires et finales (6). Sept annexes sont jointes.
Subject: Air & atmosphere, Waste & hazardous substances
Geographical_area: Benelux, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe
Entry into force notes: La présente loi entre en vigueur le 20 avril 2016.

Policy: Decree laying down details on the management of agricultural land in vulnerable areas.
Policy_Content: This Decree of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development, which is composed of nine articles and five Annexes, lays down details on: (a) maintenance of the registration and information system and the database related to the management of agricultural land in vulnerable areas; (b) obtaining weather information; (c) the application for special authorization for the use of nitrogen fertilizers; (d) the procedure for reporting on additional storage areas; (e) plans for the use of nitrogen fertilizers; (f) registration of carried out controls.
Subject: Land & soil, Cultivated plants
Geographical_area: Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries
Entry into force notes: This Decree enters into force on 1 August 2016.

Policy: Order No. 946 on the creation of Natura 2000 forest planning.
Policy_Content: The Order sets regulations on the creation of a Natura2000 forest plan which purpose is to maintain conservation status of forest habitats and to ensure that international natural conservation areas are included in an action program drawn up on the basis of  analysis and available monitoring data. The published analysis should contain: the identification of habitat and species for which the areas have been designated; assessment of its status; a map indicating the location of the mapped area. The forest planning publication shall be revised every 12 years and shall publish the final action plan after prior agreement with national and municipal authorities.
Subject: Forestry, Wild species & ecosystems
Keyword: Data collection/reporting,Forestry protection measures,Policy/planning,Ecosystem preservation,Protection forest,Forest management/forest conservation,Protection of habitats,Wild fauna,Wild flora
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Northern Europe
Entry into force notes: 1 July 2016.

Policy: Order No. 944 on municipal council Natura2000 planning.
Policy_Content: This Order applies to the municipal council's action plans for managing water supply, afforesting, improvement of water quality in large lakes, streams, estuaries and coastal waters. These plans are referred to as the local Natura2000 Blueprint or "Blueprint". The municipal Blueprint does not include decisions taken in relation to landowners when implementing such plans. Landowners deciding to develop a management or business plan in accordance to Natura2000 planning, must notify the municipality with a summary and description of management goals.
Subject: Environment gen., Water, Wild species & ecosystems
Keyword: Environmental planning,Protection of habitats,Water supply,Policy/planning,Inland waters,Local government,Wild fauna,Wild flora
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Northern Europe
Entry into force notes: 1 July 2016.

Policy: Decreto Nº 39.900/S - Modifica el Decreto Nº 39.428/S, Reglamento para el Control de la Contaminación por Ruido.
Policy_Content: El presente Decreto modifica el Reglamento para el Control de la Contaminación por Ruido, respecto a las acciones que estarán exceptuadas de los límites establecidos.
Subject: Air & atmosphere
Geographical_area: Americas, Central America, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North-East Pacific

Policy: Ley Nº 17 - Ley que establece la protección de los conocimientos de la medicina tradicional indígena.
Policy_Content: El presente Ley establece un régimen especial para proteger y promover el respeto a los conocimientos de la medicina tradicional indígena y crear mecanismos de protección del conocimiento tradicional a través del sistema especial de propiedad intelectual colectiva y garantiza la participación plena y efectiva de los congresos, consejos o autoridades tradiciones indígenas en sus distintos niveles. Asimismo, se establecen los mecanismos para la realización de estudios de los conocimientos indígenas sobre la biodiversidad y el respeto a la participación justa y equitativa en los beneficios económicos y los derechos de propiedad intelectual de los pueblos indígenas.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Wild species & ecosystems
Keyword: Traditional knowledge/indigenous knowledge,Indigenous peoples,Cultural heritage,Intellectual property rights/patents,Biodiversity,Research,Basic legislation
Geographical_area: Americas, Central America, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North-East Pacific, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Loi concernant la compatibilité électromagnétique
Policy_Content: La présente loi régit la compatibilité électromagnétique des équipements. Elle vise à assurer le fonctionnement du marché intérieur en exigeant que les équipements soient conformes à un niveau adéquat de compatibilité électromagnétique. L’article 4 concerne la mise à disposition sur le marché et/ou mise en service. Ne peuvent être mis à disposition sur le marché et/ou mis en service que les équipements qui sont conformes à la présente loi dès lors qu’ils sont dûment installés, entretenus et utilisés conformément aux fins prévues. Le texte comprend 37 articles répartis en 6 chapitres comme suit: Dispositions générales (1er); Obligations des opérateurs économiques.(2); Conformité des équipements (3); Notification des organismes d’évaluation de la conformité (4); Surveillance du marché de l’Union européenne et contrôle des appareils entrant sur le marché de l’Union européenne et procédure de sauvegarde de l’Union européenne (5); Dispositions transitoires et finales (6).
Subject: Environment gen., Waste & hazardous substances
Geographical_area: Benelux, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe
Entry into force notes: La présente loi entre en vigueur le 20 avril 2016.

Policy: Loi concernant la mise à disposition sur le marché des équipements sous pression.
Policy_Content: La présente loi concerne la mise à disposition sur le marché des équipements sous pression. Notamment, elle s’applique à la conception, à la fabrication et à l’évaluation de la conformité des équipements sous pression et des ensembles dont la pression maximale admissible (PS) est supérieure à 0,5 bar. L’article 4 porte les exigences techniques établissant que les équipements sous pression y nommés doivent satisfaire aux exigences essentielles de sécurité énoncées à l’annexe Ier. Le texte comprend 39 articles répartis en 6 chapitres comme suit: Dispositions générales (1er); Obligations des opérateurs économiques (2); Conformité et classification des équipements sous pression et des ensembles (3); Notification des organismes d’évaluation de la conformité (4); Surveillance du marché de l’Union européenne, contrôle des équipements sous pression et des ensembles entrant sur le marché de l’Union européenne et procédure de sauvegarde de l’Union européenne (5); Dispositions transitoires et finales (6).
Subject: Environment gen., Waste & hazardous substances
Geographical_area: Benelux, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe

Policy: Resolution No.1202 of 2016 amending Resolution No.1048/1 of 2016 to prevent the registration and importation of harmful pesticides.
Policy_Content: This Resolution consisting of 3 articles aims at maintaining public health and environment requirements, achieving a healthy agricultural production, and encouraging farmers to use environmentally friendly pesticides. It excludes from provisions of the Resolution the pesticides that arrived at the port of Beirut and which were shipped before the date of its issuance according to the documents provided by the owners. Article 2 provides for the import in the Lebanese territory of pesticides with percentages of breakdown products impurities, solvents and synergists approved by FAO. The pesticides local manufactured or imported from countries non included in the list of Resolution 310/1 must be analyzed in a laboratory accredited by the Ministry of Agriculture in Lebanon.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Cultivated plants
Geographical_area: Mediterranean, Middle East, NEAR EAST AND NORTH AFRICA, Western Asia
Entry into force notes: This Resolution enters into force after its publication.

Policy: Law No. HO-104-N amending Law No. ZR-295 on state registration of rights to property.
Policy_Content: Article 47.1 shall be amended to add the following wording: “Within the framework of the programs validated by the Government it is envisaged transfer of the property of legal entity to community with the right of ownership to land occupied by the state, water, energy, transport, communications, communal infrastructures, without state registration of the right of a legal person to the property and transfer of ownership of state property of the aforesaid assets to a legal entity in accordance with contract without state registration of the right of ownership of a legal person to property”.
Subject: Land & soil
Geographical_area: Asia, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Landlocked Developing Countries, Western Asia
Entry into force notes: This Law enters into force on the 10th day from the date of its official publication.

Policy: Paris Agreement (Ratification) Act No. 9 of 2016.
Policy_Content: This Act officially ratifies the provisions of the Paris Agreement. This Agreement, in enhancing the implementation of the Convention, including its objective, aims to strengthen the global response to the threat of climate change, in the context of sustainable development and efforts to eradicate poverty, including by holding the increase in the global average temperature to well below 2°C above pre-industrial levels and pursuing efforts to limit the temperature increase to 1.5°C above pre-industrial levels, recognizing that this would significantly reduce the risks and impacts of climate change; increasing the ability to adapt to the adverse impacts of climate change and foster climate resilience and low greenhouse gas emissions development, in a manner that does not threaten food production; and making finance flows consistent with a pathway towards low greenhouse gas emissions and climate-resilient development. The text of the Agreement is attached to this Act.
Subject: Environment gen., Food & nutrition
Keyword: Climate change,Emissions,International agreement-text,Poverty,Precautionary principle,Risk assessment/management,Food security
Geographical_area: ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Least Developed Countries, Melanesia, Oceania, Small Island Developing States, South Pacific
Entry into force notes: This Act enters into force on the day it is published in the Gazette.

Policy: Ordonnance Ministerielle n. 214/1225/2016 du 27/06/2016 portant mise en place des procedures de suivi de la qualité de la production des statistiques officielles au Burundi.
Policy_Content: Les dispositions de la présente ordonnance fixent les procédures de suivi de la qualité de la production des statistiques officielles au Burundi. Il s'agit des Lignes directrices sur la qualité de production des statistiques et le Code de bonnes pratiques pour la gestion du système statistique, de l'environnement institutionnel et des processus statistiques dans Systèmes Statistique National (SSN)
Subject: General
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Eastern Africa, Landlocked Developing Countries, Least Developed Countries

Policy: Ley Nº 6/2016 - Modifica la Ley Nº 6/2015, Ley Agraria de Extremadura.
Policy_Content: La presente Ley tiene por objeto modificar el capítulo III de la Ley Agraria de Extremadura, sobre el Procedimiento electoral para la determinación de la representatividad de las organizaciones profesionales agrarias en la Comunidad Autónoma de Extremadura, cuyo objeto es regulat el procedimiento electoral para la determinación de la representatividad de las organizaciones profesionales agrarias legalmente constituidas con implantación en la Comunidad Autónoma de Extremadura. La representatividad de las organizaciones agrarias se determinará mediante procedimiento electoral entre quienes tengan la condición de electores. La Comunidad Autónoma de Extremadura convocará cada cinco años un nuevo procedimiento electoral para determinar la representatividad de las organizaciones agrarias mediante decreto aprobado por el Consejo de Gobierno, a propuesta de la consejería con competencias en materia agraria y previa consulta a las organizaciones profesionales agrarias con implantación en la Comunidad Autónoma de Extremadura.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Livestock, Food & nutrition, Forestry, Land & soil, Cultivated plants
Keyword: Non-governmental entity,Legal proceedings/administrative proceedings,Cooperative/producer organization,Registration,Capacity building,Traceability/product tracing,Food quality control/food safety,Forest service/forest officers,Farming,Animal production,Plant production
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, Mediterranean, North Atlantic, North-East Atlantic, Southern Europe

Policy: Regional Law No. 107-OZ amending Article 4 of the Regional Law No. 564-OZ ““On ensuring of peace and quiet of citizens” in relation to construction and repair work in tenement buildings.
Policy_Content: Article 4 shall be amended to add the following wording: “Disturbance of peace and quiet of citizens by construction and repair work in tenement buildings shall be prohibited from 07 a.m. to 08.00 a.m. local time during working days and from 07 a.m. to 10.00 a.m. local time on week-ends and public holidays), and from 21.00 p.m. to 23.00 (on daily basis)”.
Subject: Air & atmosphere, Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific
Entry into force notes: This Regional Law enters into force ten days after the date of its official publication.

Policy: Regional Law No. 1682-OZ amending Regional Law No. 756-oz “On the modalities of calculation of lease payment, modalities and terms of payment of thereof for lease of land plots of public land”.
Policy_Content: Article 1 shall be amended to add the following wording: “Lease payment for plots of agricultural land shall be calculated with application of index 0, 3 percent”.
Subject: Land & soil
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Resolución Nº 143-2016-SERFOR ─ Modifica la denominación de Lista Oficial de Especies Forestales Maderables Aprovechables con Fines Comerciales por Lista Oficial de Especies Forestales.
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución modifica la denominación de “Lista Oficial de Especies Forestales Maderables Aprovechables con Fines Comerciales” por “Lista Oficial de Especies Forestales". Establece que el objetivo de la “Lista Oficial de Especies Forestales” es la estandarización de las denominaciones científicas y comunes de las especies forestales, las mismas que deben ser utilizadas por todas las personas naturales y jurídicas de derecho público y privado a nivel nacional, para la gestión de los recursos forestales del país. Y precisa que la “Lista Oficial de Especies Forestales” no habilita el otorgamiento de derechos de acceso o aprovechamiento sostenible de los recursos forestales, maderables o no maderables, ni afecta las prohibiciones o restricciones que para tales efectos establece la legislación vigente.
Subject: Forestry
Keyword: Forestry protection measures,Timber extraction/logging,Timber,Internal trade,International trade,Protection of species,Forest management/forest conservation
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, South America, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Acuerdo Nº 430-2016 ─ Instituye la iniciativa “Gigantes de Honduras” como medida para identificar entre las especies nativas los ejemplares de árboles más grandes para la subsecuente declaración de áreas destinadas a ser reconocidas como patrimonio nacional.
Policy_Content: El presente Acuerdo instituye la iniciativa “Gigantes de Honduras”, como una medida tipo concurso mediante el cual se identifique, entre las especies nativas de la riqueza natural hondureña, los ejemplares de árboles más grandes, para la subsecuente declaración de áreas destinadas a ser reconocidas como patrimonio nacional, con el objetivo de proteger y conservar los recursos naturales nacionales.
Subject: Forestry
Keyword: Forest management/forest conservation,Protection of species,Protected area
Geographical_area: Americas, Central America, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North-East Pacific

Policy: Interim Measures for the Administration of Public Resources Trading Platforms.
Policy_Content: These Interim Measures are enacted for the purposes of regulating the operation of public resources trading platforms, improving the efficiency and effectiveness of public resource allocation, strengthening the supervision and restriction of the operation of powers, and protecting national interests, social and public interests and the lawful rights and interests of trading parties. The Measures consist of 7 Chapters: General provisions; Platform operations; Platform Services; Information resources sharing; Supervision and management; Legal liability; Supplementary provisions.
Subject: Energy, Fisheries, Land & soil, Mineral resources, Sea, Water
Keyword: Oil,Natural gas,Offences/penalties,Internal trade,Fishery management and conservation,Inspection,Land tenure,Ownership,Minerals,Mining,Irrigation
Geographical_area: Asia, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, East Asian Seas, Eastern Asia, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Decree promoting electric energy from renewable sources other than photovoltaic.
Policy_Content: This Decree concerns the granting of subsidies for the production of electric energy from renewable sources other than photovoltaic installations. Article 8 lays down special provisions relating to installations for biomass, biogas and biofuels. The Decree provides the procedure to be followed to benefit from these subsidies. Individuals and entities responsible for installations concerned shall submit their application to the GSE (“Gestore servizi energetici”, the authority in charge of managing energy services).
Subject: Energy
Geographical_area: Alps, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, Mediterranean, Southern Europe

Policy: Regional Law No. 68/2016-OZ amending Regional Law No. 186/2014-OZ “On state policy in the sphere of tourism”.
Policy_Content: Article 6 shall be amended to add the following wording: “Regional executive bodies shall be responsible for determination of priority directions for the development of tourism at the regional level, creation of favorable conditions for the development of tourism sector, information coverage of tourism and participation in implementation of international agreements related to tourism”.
Subject: Environment gen., Wild species & ecosystems
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Regional Law No. 69/2016-OZ amending Regional Law No. 97/2010-OZ “On energy saving and improvement of energy efficiency”.
Policy_Content: Article 2 shall be amended to add the following wording: “The main directions of the regional state policy in the sphere of energy saving shall be: (a) program approach to energy saving and improvement of energy efficiency; (b) instrumental metering in the process of energy generation, processing, transport, storage, distribution and consumption; (c) use of renewable energy sources; and (d) monitoring and assessment of the consumption of energy resources, and efficiency of use thereof”.
Subject: Energy
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Regulation amending the Regulation on the internal organization of the Ministry of Agriculture.
Policy_Content: This Regulation amends some articles provided by the Regulation on the internal organization of the Ministry of Agriculture (Official Gazette 80/2013, 16/2014, 50/2014, 46/2015 and 63/2015).
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Mediterranean, Southern Europe
Entry into force notes: This Regulation enters into force eight days after its publication in the Official Gazette.

Policy: Ordonnance portant introduction d'une représentation équilibrée des femmes et des hommes au Collège d'environnement (1).
Policy_Content: La présente ordonnance modifie l'ordonnance du 5 juin 1997 relative aux permis d'environnement. Notamment, à l'article 79, entre le 2e et le 3e alinéa, il est inséré un alinéa rédigé comme suit: «Les deux tiers au plus des membres du Collège d'environnement appartiennent au même sexe. Chacune des deux listes qui constituent la liste double présentée par le Parlement de la Région de Bruxelles-Capitale compte suffisamment d'hommes et de femmes pour que cette condition soit respectée. Lorsque tel n'est pas le cas, le ministre qui a l'environnement dans ses attributions renvoie la liste double au Parlement afin que celui-ci la modifie. Si, par l'effet d'un empêchement de longue durée, d'une démission, d'une révocation ou d'un décès, le respect du critère de genre n'est plus assuré, cette circonstance n'affecte pas la régularité des travaux et décisions du Collège d'environnement pourvu que la procédure de renouvellement consécutif à cet empêchement de longue durée, à cette démission, à cette révocation ou à ce décès soit entamée dans un délai raisonnable.» Le texte comprend 3 articles.
Subject: Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Benelux, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Atlantic, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe

Policy: Federal Law No. 206-FZ amending Forest Code (No. 200 – FZ).
Policy_Content: This Federal Law is aimed at implementing measures for the development of hunting in the country, as stipulated in the Strategy for the Development of Hunting in the Russian Federation until 2030. In particular, it has been established that land plots, including those from the forest fund lands and lands of protected natural areas, can be allotted free of charge on condition of tenancy as service allotments. In addition, for keeping and breeding hunting resources under semi-free conditions (captive breeding) and in artificially created habitats, it is allowed to organize wildlife nurseries, aviaries and other necessary objects of hunting infrastructure.
Subject: Forestry, Wild species & ecosystems
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific
Entry into force notes: This Federal Law enters into force on 1 January 2017.

Policy: Federal Law No. 196-FZ amending Federal Law 35-FZ on electric energy.
Policy_Content: This Federal Law defines the concept of the Unified energy system of Russia as an electric power system that is located within the territory of the Russian Federation and a centralized operational and dispatching system, the management of which is performed by the system operator of the Unified energy system of Russia; and the concept of reliability and stability of the electric power system related to generation, transmission and supply of electric energy to the consumers. It also establishes the measures of state regulation in the sphere of reliability and stability of hydropower generation and distribution.
Subject: Energy
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific
Entry into force notes: This Federal Law enters into force on the date of its official publication.

Policy: Decreto N° 2.359 - Varía la adscripción de las Empresas del Estado del Ministerio del Poder Popular para las Comunas y los Movimientos Sociales, a la Corporación de Desarrollo Agrícola, S.A., a su vez adscrita al Ministerio del Poder Popular para la Agricultura Productiva y Tierras.
Policy_Content: El presente Decreto varía la adscripción de las Empresas del Estado que en él se mencionan, del Ministerio del Poder Popular para las Comunas y los Movimientos Sociales, a la Corporación de Desarrollo Agrícola, S.A., a su vez adscrita al Ministerio del Poder Popular para la Agricultura Productiva y Tierras.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Land & soil
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North Atlantic, South America

Policy: Arrêté du Gouvernement wallon modifiant l'arrêté du Gouvernement wallon du 30 novembre 2006 relatif à la promotion de l'électricité produite au moyen de sources d'énergie renouvelables ou de cogénération.
Policy_Content: Le présent arrêté du Gouvernement wallon modifie l'arrêté du Gouvernement wallon du 30 novembre 2006 relatif à la promotion de l'électricité produite au moyen de sources d'énergie renouvelables ou de cogénération. Notamment, dans l'article 15octies, paragraphe 2, de l'arrêté du Gouvernement wallon du 30 novembre 2006 précité l'alinéa 3 est remplacé par ce qui suit: «Si la CWaPE constate l'absence de rentabilité suffisante de l'installation visée à l'alinéa 2, elle autorise le changement de régime d'octroi des certificats verts et détermine, dans la limite d'une enveloppe globale de 140.000 certificats verts par an pour les producteurs à partir d'installations d'électricité produite à partir de la bio-méthanisation agricole et d'une enveloppe globale de 650.000 certificats verts par an pour les producteurs à partir d'installations d'électricité produite à partir de biomasse solide, pour le solde des années d'octroi de certificats verts restantes à courir le nouveau coefficient KECO, celui-ci étant applicable au moment de la communication du dossier visé aux alinéas 1er et 2.». Le texte comprend 3 articles.
Subject: Energy
Geographical_area: Benelux, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Atlantic, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe

Policy: Decreto Nº 40.148/S/MAG/MINAE/MTSS/RE/H - Política Nacional de Seguridad Química.
Policy_Content: El presente Decreto declara la Política Nacional de Seguridad Química de interés público, con el objetivo de lograr la gestión integral de las sustancias químicas durante todo su ciclo de vida para minimizar los efectos adversos a la salud humana y el ambiente. Corresponde al Ministerio de Ambiente y Energía (MINAE), liderar y coordinar las acciones necesarias para facilitar su implementación en el país, a través de la Secretaría Técnica de Coordinación para la Gestión de Sustancias Químicas.
Subject: Environment gen., Waste & hazardous substances
Keyword: Policy/planning,Hazardous substances,Hazardous waste,Monitoring,Environmental security,Pollution control,Waste prevention,Waste management
Geographical_area: Americas, Central America, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North-East Pacific

Policy: Loi n°2016-022 du 23 juin 2016 autorisant la ratification de l’Accord International de 2006 sur les Bois Tropicaux (AIBT, 2006).
Policy_Content: La présente loi autorise la ratification de l’Accord International de 2006 sur les Bois Tropicaux (AIBT 2006) ayant pour objectif de promouvoir l'expansion et la diversification du commerce international des bois tropicaux issus de forêts faisant l'objet d'une gestion durable et d'une exploitation dans le respect de la légalité et de promouvoir la gestion durable des forêts tropicales productrices de bois.
Subject: Forestry
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Eastern Africa, Indian Ocean, Least Developed Countries

Policy: Resolution No. 273 of 2016 of Georgian Government on Granting Recreational Status to Ureki-Shekvetili and Determining its Borders
Policy_Content: The Resolution sets up the Recreational Territory of Ureki-Shekvetili and defines its borders (12 sections).
Subject: Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Asia, Black Sea, Eastern Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Western Asia

Policy: Décret n° 100/132 du 23 juin 2016 portant procédure de développement d'une centrale de production de l’énergie à usage exclusif et commercial.
Policy_Content: Le présent décret fixe la procédure applicable dans le développement d'une centrale électrique à usage commercial ou exclusif. La procédure liée au développement d'une centrale se fait en deux étapes: la réalisation des études de faisabilité autorisées par une Ordonnance du Ministre; l’obtention d'un permis de construction et d'exploitation d'une centrale délivré par Décret du Président de la République ou l'Ordonnance du Ministre, selon les distinctions prévues à l’article12.
Subject: Energy
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Eastern Africa, Landlocked Developing Countries, Least Developed Countries

Policy: Décret n° 100/131 du 23 juin 2016 relatif à la production, à l'importation et d'exportation d'électricité.
Policy_Content: Le présent décret fixe, en application de la Loi n° 1/13 du 23 avril 2015 portant réorganisation du secteur de l’électricité au Burundi, les conditions relatives à la production, l’importation et l’exportation de l’électricité au Burundi. A cet effet, ce texte fixe les pouvoirs du ministre ayant l’électricité dans ses attributions de limiter ou interdire la production, l'importation et l'exportation de l’électricité au Burundi, conformément à l’article 36 de la loi n° 1/13 du 23 avril 2015 portant réorganisation du secteur de l’électricité.  Toutefois, l'Agence de contrôle et de régulation est consultée par le Ministre avant en charge l’électricité préalablement à toute décision de limitation ou interdiction de la production, des importations ou des exportations en matière d'électricité.
Subject: Energy
Keyword: Energy conservation/energy production,Public private partnership (PPP),Governance,International trade
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Eastern Africa, Landlocked Developing Countries, Least Developed Countries

Policy: Décret n° 100/129 du 23 juin 2016 portant modalités d’application des dispositions du chapitre 3 des droits fonciers certifiés de la loi n° 1/13 du 09 aout 2011 portant révision du code foncier du Burundi.
Policy_Content: Le présent décret fixe le fonctionnement du Service Foncier Communal, la procédure et les modalités d'établissement des certificats fonciers. En effet, ne peut faire l’objet d'une certification que le seul droit réel de propriété. Les autres droits réels peuvent être inscrits au registre foncier communal et reportés au certificat constatant la propriété foncière. Ces droits sont établis selon des modalités fixées par la loi n° 1/13 du 09 août 2011 portant Révision du Code Foncier du Burundi et par le présent décret.
Subject: Land & soil

Il fixe notamment la procédure d'autorisation de construction des lignes de transport de l’électricité pour la desserte des tiers; les dispositions relatives à la vente d'électricité par des producteurs indépendants alimentant et gérant leur réseau de transport et de distribution d’électricité; les dispositions relatives à la vente d'électricité par des producteurs indépendants alimentant et gérant leur réseau de transport et de distribution d'électricité; et la libéralisation de la commercialisation de l'électricité à l'expiration de la délégation de service public conclue avec l'exploitant principal.

Policy: Municipal Planning By-law, 2016.
Policy_Content: This By-law of the city of Johannesburg concerns spatial development of the city area and regulates development matters such as water infrastructure, development authorisations, environmental protection, subdivisions or consolidations of land, establishment of townships, and zoning. It also requires the city council to establish a Planning Tribunal for its municipal area. The Municipal Planning Tribunal shall decide applications referred to it as per the Municipal Planning Tribunal’s approved terms of reference, the provisions of the Spatial Planning and Land Use Management Act, 2013 (SPLUMA) and this By-law. The City shall adopt and approve, after public consultation, a single land use scheme for its entire area of jurisdiction. Such scheme shall, among other things, take cognisance of any environmental management instrument adopted by the relevant environmental management authority, and must comply with environmental legislation. The City has a duty to enforce the provisions of its land use scheme and any use of land which is deemed contrary to such land use scheme shall constitute a criminal offence. The City may adopt a By-law aimed at enforcing the provisions of its land use scheme. The City must also adopt and approve a municipal spatial development framework for the municipality. The framework shall include a strategic assessment of the environmental pressures and opportunities within the City’s area of jurisdiction, including the spatial location of environmental sensitivities and high potential agricultural land.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Environment gen., Land & soil, Water
Keyword: Land-use planning,Agricultural development,Pollution control,Environmental planning,Basic legislation,Court/tribunal,Governance,Zoning,Subdivision of land,Land consolidation,Legal proceedings/administrative proceedings,Waterworks

Policy: Ley de desarrollo rural sustentable para el Estado de Baja California Sur.
Policy_Content: La presente Ley busca promover y lograr el desarrollo rural sustentable, propiciando un medio ambiente equilibrado entre la conservación, restauración y aprovechamiento de los diferentes ecosistemas existentes en el ámbito rural, con aplicación de técnicas sustentables y  sostenibles  para la producción  agrícola, pecuaria, forestal, acuícola y de sistemas agrosilvopastoriles, así como de sanidad e inocuidad, que permitan la vida y desarrollo a los seres vivos que habitan la geografía rural  en el Estado de Baja California Sur.

Policy: Règlement grand-ducal relatif a) aux contrôles d’équipements de réfrigération, de climatisation et de pompes à chaleur fonctionnant aux fluides réfrigérants du type HFC, HCFC ou CFC; b) à l’inspection des systèmes de climatisation.
Policy_Content: Le présent règlement met en exécution la loi du 22 juin 2016 relative aux gaz à effet de serre fluorés. Notamment, l’article 1er établit que le règlement précise les modalités du contrôle d’étanchéité des équipements suivants, dénommés «équipement» e énumérés dans cet article. Le texte comprend 10 articles comme suit: Objet et champ d’application (1); Définitions (2); Fuites (3); Réceptions des équipements (4); Contrôles d’étanchéité des équipements (5); Inspection des systèmes de climatisation (6); Mise hors service (7); Frais de réception, de contrôle d’étanchéité et d’inspection (8); Disposition abrogatoire (9); Exécution (10). Policy: Law No. 13.299 amending several legislation providing for concessions generation, transmission and distribution of electric energy.
Policy_Content: This Law amends several legislation providing for concessions generation, transmission and distribution of electric energy. In particular, it establishes that the uses based on a biomass source whose power injected into the transmission and distribution systems is greater than 30,000 kW (thirty thousand kilowatts) and less than or equal to fifty thousand kilowatts do not meet the criteria defined in § 1-A, as well as those provided for in item VI shall be entitled to the reduction percentage on the tariffs for the use of the transmission and distribution systems provided for in Paragraph 1, limiting on the application of the discount to 30,000 kW (thirty thousand kilowatts) of injected power in transmission and distribution systems.

Policy: Act on Revitalization of Direct Trade in Agricultural Products, including Promotion of Use of Local Agricultural Products.
Policy_Content: The purpose of this Act is to contribute to developing the local economy, improving the distribution structure of agricultural products, increasing the income of farming households, and protecting the interests of consumers, by providing for matters necessary to promote the use of local agricultural products and to revitalize direct trade in agricultural products. In particular, the State shall endeavor to protect the interests of farmers and consumers through promotion of the use of local agricultural products and the revitalization of direct trade in agricultural products, and to implement a comprehensive policy to revitalize the local economy, to decrease the number of distribution stages of agricultural products, and to reduce distribution expenses. The text consists of 33 articles.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Geographical_area: Asia, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, East Asian Seas, Eastern Asia, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Decree-Law No. 16/2016 creating the Ministry of Petroleum and Mineral Resources.
Policy_Content: This Decree-Law, consisting of 21 articles divided into four Chapters and one Annex, creates the Ministry of Petroleum and Mineral Resources (MPRM). It establishes composition, duties and responsibilities of the above mentioned Ministry, entitled to design and implementation of energy policy and management of mineral resources, including petroleum and other strategic minerals, approved by the Council of Ministers, and by the regulation of the extractive activity, including petrochemical and refining. The competencies of the MPRM are: a) elaborate and propose the policy and draft legislation in the sector; b) establish the system of administration and sectoral management and regulate the activities of the sector; c) ensure Timor-Leste's participation in activities of oil and mineral resources sector through legal, administrative and technical adequate instruments; d) promote national opportunities in the sector to attract external investments; e) monitor the implementation of the Treaties; f) conduct the negotiation process regarding the development model of the 'Greater Sunrise' field or other matters related to the exercise of jurisdiction in the Timor Sea; g) coordinate the execution of the 'Tasi Mane' project by licensing and monitoring the activities carried out in dedicated areas; h) determine specific contractual terms of exploitation of petroleum resources and mining licenses, etc.
Subject: Energy, Mineral resources
Geographical_area: Asia, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Indian Ocean, Least Developed Countries, Small Island Developing States, South-Eastern Asia

Policy: Law of Georgia on Innovations (No. 5501-IIs of 2016)
Policy_Content: The purpose of this Law is to establish and improve a national innovations ecosystem required for the social and economic development of Georgia, to build the economy of the country on the basis of knowledge and innovations, to facilitate the use of technologies in Georgia which are created in other states, to promote the introduction and export of intellectual property and technologies created in Georgia, and to ensure the penetration of high technologies into all areas of science and economy in order to increase the competitiveness of the said areas. This Law shall apply to entities carrying out innovation activities, and the infrastructure supporting innovation activities, as well as the financing and commercialisation of innovation activities. State strategy in the area of innovations shall be approved by the Government of Georgia, by the recommendation of the advisory body of the Government of Georgia called the Research and Innovations Council. The Government of Georgia shall, in accordance with the priorities set forth in state strategy in the area of innovations, determine the subjects responsible for the implementation of the strategy. The legal entity under public law called Georgia's Innovation and Technology Agency (the Agency) shall promote the commercialisation of innovations and stimulate the use of such innovations.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, General

Policy: Resolución Nº 140-2016-SERFOR ─ Lineamientos para realizar estudios de exploración y evaluación de los recursos forestales en el proceso de otorgamiento de concesiones forestales con fines maderables.
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución aprueba los Lineamientos para realizar estudios de exploración y evaluación de los recursos forestales en el proceso de otorgamiento de concesiones forestales con fines maderables, con el objetivo de definir criterios para realizar estudios de exploración y evaluación de recursos forestales, a ser considerados por postores o ganadores en procesos de otorgamiento de concesiones forestales con fines maderables que tengan interés en mejorar la información sobre el potencial productivo del área de interés. La finalidad de los Lineamientos es promover el aprovechamiento sostenible de productos forestales maderables, provenientes de bosques naturales primarios categorizados como Bosques de Producción Permanente (BPP), en el marco de la Política Nacional Forestal y de Fauna Silvestre.

Policy: Resolución Nº 156-2016-MINAM ─ Procedimiento Técnico y Metodológico para la Elaboración del Estudio Especializado de Dinámica Económica Regional.
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución aprueba el Procedimiento Técnico y Metodológico para la Elaboración del Estudio Especializado de Dinámica Económica Regional, de aplicación y cumplimiento obligatorio a todos los procesos preparatorios para el ordenamiento territorial, en trámite o por iniciarse, independientemente de su ámbito de ejecución. El Estudio Especializado de Dinámica Económica Regional identifica y caracteriza la dinámica económica del ámbito geográfico analizado las tendencias de crecimiento económico a partir de la articulación interna, así como con el entorno (a nivel nacional e internacional). Permite además, conocer tendencias de crecimiento y desarrollo de asentamientos poblacionales, conectividad, áreas vulnerables, así como actividades que ponen en riesgo el ecosistema o recursos naturales existentes en el ámbito geográfico. Se encuentra conformado por las siguientes Pautas Técnicas: Pauta técnica de Dinámica Económica, y Pauta técnica de Dinámica de Sistemas y Organización Territorial.
Subject: Environment gen.
Keyword: Environmental planning,Land-use planning,Urban land,Legal proceedings/administrative proceedings,Fiscal and market measures,Risk assessment/management

Policy: Resolución Nº 161-2016-MINAM ─ Lineamientos para el Crecimiento Verde.
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución aprueba los Lineamientos para el Crecimiento Verde, en el sentido de que la economía verde, en un contexto de desarrollo sostenible y de erradicación de la pobreza, es uno de los instrumentos más importantes disponibles para lograr el desarrollo sostenible, que puede ofrecer alternativas en cuanto a la formulación de políticas. En ese sentido, alienta a todos los países que incorporen el concepto de economía verde como una herramienta hacia el desarrollo sostenible, que contribuya a la erradicación de la pobreza y el crecimiento económico sostenible, aumentando la inclusión social, mejorando el bienestar humano y creando oportunidades de empleo y trabajo decente para todos, manteniendo al mismo tiempo el funcionamiento saludable de los ecosistemas de la Tierra.
Subject: Environment gen.
Keyword: Sustainable development,Environmental planning,Fiscal and market measures,Ecological production/organic production,Agricultural land,Less favoured areas

Policy: Resolución Nº 160-2016-MINAM ─ Proceso de transferencia de funciones en materia de transportes al Servicio Nacional de Certificación Ambiental para las Inversiones Sostenibles (SENACE).
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución aprueba la culminación del proceso de transferencia de funciones del Subsector transportes del Ministerio de Transportes y Comunicaciones (MTC) al Servicio Nacional de Certificación Ambiental para las Inversiones Sostenibles (SENACE), que incluye: 1) revisar y aprobar los Estudios de Impacto Ambiental detallados, las respectivas actualizaciones, modificaciones, informes técnicos sustentatorios, solicitudes de clasificación y aprobación de términos de referencia, acompañamiento en la elaboración de Línea Base, Plan de Participación Ciudadana y demás actos o procedimientos vinculados a las acciones antes señaladas; 2) administrar el Registro de Entidades Autorizadas a elaborar Estudios Ambientales; 3) administrar el Registro Administrativo de carácter público y actualizado de certificaciones ambientales concedidas o denegadas.

Policy: Regional Law No. 92-Z “On ensuring fertility of agricultural land”.
Policy_Content: The scope of this Regional Law shall be to ensure fertility of agricultural land by owners, landlords, land tenants and leaseholders. The main arrangements for ensuring soil fertility shall be: (a) elaboration and realization of regional programs; (b) soil, agrochemical, phytosanitary, ecological and toxicological inspection; (c) investments in soil conservation and reproduction; and (d) improvement of soil quality and fertility. Owners, tenants and leaseholders of agricultural land must: (a) prevent soil pollution, littering and degradation; (b) carry out agricultural production by methods ensuring reproduction of soil fertility and preventing negative environmental impact; (c) inform authorized institutions of soil pollution and degradation of agricultural land; and (d) not apply ecologically hazardous fertilizers, ameliorators and pesticides.
Subject: Land & soil
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific
Entry into force notes: This Regional Law enters into force ten days after the date of its official publication.

Policy: Resolución Nº 40.608 - Esquema de incentivos por el aprovechamiento y la explotación integral de los recursos naturales no renovables y metodología para su aplicación y asignación para la vigencia 2016.
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución tiene por objeto definir el esquema para el reconocimiento del incentivo por el aprovechamiento y la explotación integral de los recursos naturales no renovables, establecer la metodología para su aplicación y asignación y determinar las entidades territoriales beneficiarias, para la vigencia 2016. La Comisión Rectora del Sistema General de Regalías destinarña los recursos correspondientes al incentivo por el aprovechamiento y la explotación integral de los recursos naturales no renovables a financiar o cofinanciar proyectos de inversión en los territorios donde se realizan actividades de exploración y explotación, en las siguientes líneas teniendo en cuenta: 1) Restauración social; 2) Restauración económica; 3) Protección y recuperación ambiental.
Subject: Environment gen., Mineral resources

Policy: Resolución Nº 40.607 - Guía única de transporte para el Gas Licuado de Petróleo (GLP).
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución, considerando que el almacenamiento, envasado, manejo, comercialización, transporte y distribución de gas licuado de petróleo (GLP) son considerados servicios públicos, tiene por objeto establecer la obligatoriedad del uso de la Guía única de transporte de Gas Licuado de Petróleo (GLP), como requisito indispensable para la distribución de GLP a granel en la modalidad terrestre y fluvial, así como los requisitos y obligaciones de los agentes de la cadena en esta materia, con el fin de combatir la movilización ilegal de este combustible. Los agentes de la cadena de distribución de GLP tienen la obligación de hacer uso de la Guía, como requisito indispensable para la distribución terrestre y fluvial a granel de este combustible.

Policy: Ley Nº 1785 - Establece la Red para la Superación de la Pobreza Extrema – Red Unidos.
Policy_Content: La presente Ley tiene por objeto establecer la Red para la Superación de la Pobreza Extrema, denominada Red Unidos. La Red Unidos es el conjunto de actores que contribuyen en la Estrategia de Superación de la Pobreza Extrema, y está conformada por las entidades del Estado que presten servicios sociales dirigidos a la población en pobreza extrema, Alcaldías y Gobernaciones, el Sector Privado y Organizaciones de la Sociedad Civil, y los hogares beneficiarios del acompañamiento familiar y comunitario. La Red Unidos desarrollará sus acciones bajo la coordinación del Departamento Administrativo para la Prosperidad Social.

Policy: Resolution No. 60/2017 creating the National Technical Team (ETN), responsible for coordinating and formulating the National Programme for Agricultural Investment, Food and Nutrition Security (PNIASAN-CV).
Policy_Content: This Resolution, consisting of 5 articles, creates the National Technical Team (ETN), responsible for coordinating and formulating the National Programme for Agricultural Investment, Food and Nutrition Security (PNIASAN-CV). It establishes competencies, composition and duties of the above mentioned Team, entitled to ensure the coordination and definition of the sectoral policies as well as the participation of the central administration structures in the elaboration and execution of the National Programme of Agricultural Investment, Food and Nutritional Security, and for this purpose: a) Implement the The PNIASAN-CV formulation guide; b) Define the strategic framework of PNIASAN-CV by 2025 and national priorities; c) Participate in the formulation of PNIASAN CV 2017-2021; d) Analyze the agro-silvo-pastoral and fishery technical aspects and propose activities and actions properly budgeted; e) Identify the main agricultural ranks; f) Align the sectoral strategy with the main long-term planning instruments, including the Government Programme, Sustainable Development Strategic Programme (PEDS), Sustainable Development Objective (ODS), Integrated Agriculture Development Programme in Africa (CAADP) and the African Agriculture Development Programme (PDDA); g) Facilitate the integration in PNIASAN-CV of emerging issues related to, inter alia, climate change, the environment, food and nutritional security, resilience and innovative techniques in agriculture and gender; h) Support national and international consultants in the process of preparing PNIASAN-CV; i) Ensure the effective involvement of different partners and actors, public or private, in the formulation of PNIASAN; j) Participate in the drafting of the PNIASAN document, in accordance with the structure defined by ECOWAS, and ensure its quality.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Food & nutrition

Geographical_area: Asia, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, East Asian Seas, Eastern Asia, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Sanitation (Wastewater Management) Policy 2016.
Policy_Content: This Wastewater Management Policy is a 10-year sectoral document that represents a framework path where inserting detailed actions identified through the developing strategies. The Policy aims at providing for the development of wastewater management in a way that contributes to the sustainability of the Cook Island, described by the Vision statement as follows "sustainable and economically viable, safeguarding the health of the environment and communities taking into account the effects of climate change". The wastewater treatment systems taken into account by the document refer only to (i) domestic residential homes; (ii) commercial facilities including tourist accommodation; and (iii) community and public buildings. To reach the overall goal, have been identified 2 strategic objectives (1) ensure that wastewater is managed in a manner which protects public health and the environment and has regard to the local context (use of on-site wastewater treatment systems or, where necessary, septic tank systems according to certain requirements to be met when designing and managing these systems); and (2) ensure an integrated approach to wastewater management which recognizes and clarifies public, community and individual responsibilities.
Subject: Environment gen., Water
Keyword: Effluent waste water/discharge,Public health,Freshwater quality/freshwater pollution,Integrated management,Climate change,Protection of environment,Pollution control

Policy: Solid Waste Management Policy 2016 – 2026.
Policy_Content: The Solid Waste Management Policy is a national policy with a cross-sectoral approach. The timeframe of this Policy is ten years between 2016 and 2026. The purpose of this Policy is to improve the Cook Islands' solid waste management and promote shared responsibility for waste management by all stakeholders.

Policy: Resolution No. 5/2016 approving the Statute of the National Institution of Mining (INAMI).
Policy_Content: This Resolution, consisting of 28 articles divided into five Chapters, approves the Statute of the National Institution of Mining (INAMI), created by Law No. 20/2014. It establishes composition, duties and responsibilities of the above mentioned institution, responsible for the guidelines to participating in this sector; public and private research; exploration; processing; export and import of mineral products and their derivatives. In addition, it specifies structure and functions of the units, income and expenses and staff. The Institution is the competent authority for: proposing development policies in the mining sector; approving projects, technical and economic studies for the opening of new mines; allocating exploration and research licenses, mining concessions and mineral water concessions, under the mining legislation; controlling the research and extraction, use and exploitation of mineral resources, excluding oil and gas, etc.
Subject: Mineral resources
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Eastern Africa, Indian Ocean, Least Developed Countries
Entry into force notes: This Resolution enters into force on the day of its publication.

Policy: Plant Protection Act (No. 6 of 2016).
Policy_Content: This Act makes provision for measures for the prevention of the spreading of plant diseases and pests in the Bahamas. The objectives of this Act are- (a) to prevent the introduction and spread of plant diseases and alien invasive species in order to protect and promote and maintain the health of plants, including forestry and wild flora: (b) to promote the use of good agricultural practices; (c) to regulate the trade in plants, plant products and other regulated articles; and (d) to give effect to the  WTO Agreement on the Application of Sanitary and Phytosanitary Measures (SPS Agreement). This Act applies to all plants and plant products, plant establishments and all plant owners.
Subject: Forestry, Cultivated plants, Wild species & ecosystems

Se aplica a las personas naturales o jurídicas, privadas o públicas, nacionales o extranjeras, que realicen actividades en el subsector eléctrico y a los usuarios del servicio eléctrico residencial.

Policy: Décret gouvernemental n° 2016-771 du 20 juin 2016, fixant la composition et prérogatives du conseil stratégique de partenariat public privé.
Policy_Content: Le présent décret gouvernemental fixe la composition et les prérogatives du conseil stratégique de partenariat public privé. Le conseil arrête les stratégies et les politiques nationales dans le domaine du partenariat public privé et fixe les priorités selon les orientations des plans de développement. Il est chargé, à cet effet de ce qui suit : l'approbation de la stratégie nationale de partenariat public privé et des propositions visant son actualisation et son développement; le suivi et l'évaluation de l'exécution de la stratégie nationale de partenariat public privé ; fournir l’appui nécessaire pour l'exécution de la stratégie nationale de partenariat public privé; émettre les directives et les recommandations nécessaires en vue de développer la stratégie et les modalités de son exécution; fixer les priorités sectorielles et régionales de partenariat public privé; fixer les programmes quinquennaux des projets de partenariat public privé et assurer leur suivi et leur actualisation dans le cadre des plans de développement ; étudier les modifications et les améliorations nécessaires au cadre législatif et règlementaire des contrats de partenariat public privé et ce, en coordination avec l’instance générale de partenariat public privé, proposer toutes les procédures et mesures concernant la prévention et la lutte contre la corruption dans le domaine du partenariat public privé et ce, en coordination avec l'instance de la bonne gouvernance et de la lutte contre la corruption.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Geographical_area: Africa, Mediterranean, NEAR EAST AND NORTH AFRICA, Northern Africa
