Policy: Decreto Nº 5.068 – Por el cual se reglamenta la Ley Nº 5.527/2015 de rehabilitación financiera para pequeños productores, de educación financiera y de protección contra las prácticas crediticias abusivas o engañosas.
Policy_Content: El presente Decreto tiene por objeto reglamentar la Ley Nº 5.527 de 2015 sobre rehabilitación financiera para pequeños productores, de educación financiera y de protección contra las prácticas crediticias abusivas o engañosas, cuyo fin último es facilitar el financiamiento de las unidades productivas compuestas por personas sujetas a la reforma agraria y los micro y pequeños emprendedores rurales. El artículo 3º contiene la definición de agricultura familiar. El artículo 5º enuncia las condiciones técnicas y jurídicas-financieras requeridas para acceder a los beneficios contemplados por la Ley.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Geographical_area: Americas, Landlocked Developing Countries, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, South America

Policy: Arrêté ministériel modifiant l'article 7 de l'arrêté ministériel du 10 septembre 2015 exécutant l'arrêté du Gouvernement wallon du 10 septembre 2015 relatif aux aides au développement et à l'investissement dans le secteur agricole.
Policy_Content: Le présent arrêté met en exécution, entre autres, le règlement d'exécution (UE) n° 808/2014 de la Commission du 17 juillet 2014 portant modalités d'application du Règlement (UE) n° 1305/2013 du Parlement européen et du Conseil relatif au soutien au développement rural par le Fonds européen agricole pour le développement rural (Feader). Notamment, l’arrêté apporte une modification mineure à l’article 7 de l'arrêté ministériel du 10 septembre 2015 exécutant l'arrêté du Gouvernement wallon du 10 septembre 2015 relatif aux aides au développement et à l'investissement dans le secteur agricole.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Geographical_area: Benelux, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Atlantic, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe

Policy: Law No. 3.769 amending Law No. 3.686 on the Environmental Licensing System of the State of Rondônia.
Policy_Content: This Law amends the Environmental Licensing System of the State of Rondônia. Amendments deal with provisions established from Annexes I to XXXV of Law No. 3.686 of 8 December 2015. Some of the amendments define the amounts corresponding to the Environmental Licensing fees set out in from Annexes II to XXXIX, expressed in Fiscal Standard Unit of the State of Rondônia - UPF-RO, representing the spent or estimated costs of the service being provided by the Environmental Authority to the contributor.
Subject: Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North Atlantic, South America, South Atlantic
Entry into force notes: This Law enters into force on the day of its publication.

Policy: Water Supply (Water Quality) (Amendment) Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 410 (W. 128) of 2016).
Policy_Content: These Regulations amend the Water Supply (Water Quality) Regulations 2010 so as to implement Council Directive 2013/51/EURATOM on the protection of the health of the general public with regard to the radioactive substances in water intended for human consumption in relation to water supplied by water undertakers whose areas are wholly or mainly in Wales. The Regulations, among other things: insert a new regulation 6A on monitoring of radioactive substances; insert new Schedule 2A, which sets parametric values for the radioactive substances parameters; insert new Schedule 3A, which includes further monitoring requirements for the radioactive substances parameters; insert new Schedule 5, which makes provision for additional sampling and analysis requirements in relation to the radioactive substances parameters listed in the new Schedule 2A.
Subject: Environment gen., Food & nutrition, Water
Keyword: Pollution control,Radiation,Food quality control/food safety,Potable water,Standards,Water supply,Freshwater quality/freshwater pollution,Water quality standards,Inspection,Monitoring,Offences/penalties
Geographical_area: Atlantic Ocean Islands, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Atlantic, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Northern Europe

Policy: Resolución Nº 110 - Modifica la Resolución Nº 734, sobre medidas de control de quemas y condiciones para el otorgamiento de permisos de quema para la cosecha de caña.
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución modifica y amplía la que establece excepciones para la quema de masa vegetal, respecto a las solicitudes de permiso para quema de masa vegetal de los ingenios azucareros o alcoholeros y de los productores de caña en los casos en que se demuestre que éste sea el único método disponible; también se exceptúan de la suspensión las solicitudes de permiso de quema de masa vegetal para la producción agropecuaria de subsistencia.
Subject: Forestry, Cultivated plants
Geographical_area: Americas, Central America, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North-East Pacific, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Decree laying down details on agrochemical testing of soil and on the storage and use of fertilizers.
Policy_Content: This Decree of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development, which is composed of 17 articles and eight Annexes, lays down details on: (a) the soil sampling procedure, the method and scope of the agrochemical soil testing and the identification of soil properties of the forest land; (b) storage and use of fertilizers, secondary sources of nutrients and compost;(c) keeping records on the consumption and use of fertilizers, secondary sources of nutrients and compost; (d) method of processing the annual balance of nutrients and on the method of providing data to the Central Agricultural Inspection and Testing Institute.
Subject: Land & soil, Cultivated plants
Geographical_area: Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries
Entry into force notes: This Decree enters into force on 15 April 2016.

Policy: Order No. 84 of the Ministry of Natural Resources and Ecology of the Russian Federation validating the Regulation on the state nature reserve “Kologriv forest”.
Policy_Content: This Order establishes that the state nature reserve “Kologriv forest” shall be located in the province of Kostroma. It shall perform the following functions: (a) the protection of natural areas in order to conserve biological diversity and maintain in a natural state protected natural complexes and objects; (b) the organization and performance of scientific research, including keeping and updating of the Annals of Nature; (c) performance of state environmental monitoring; (d) environmental education and development of cognitive tourism; and (e) assistance in the training of scientific personnel and specialists in the field of environmental protection. On the territory of the reserve, any activity shall be prohibited any activity that contradicts the objectives of the state nature reserve and the regime for its special protection, including: (a) commercial, artisanal and sport hunting; (b) commercial fisheries;  (c) stay with firearms, pneumatic and throwing weapons, and hunting gear; (d) exploration of minerals and mining; (e) soil disturbance; (f) activities that entail changes in the hydrological regime of land; (g) procurement of soft resin; (h) clear cutting of forests; (i) timber extraction and harvesting of non-timber products; (j) transit passage and grazing of cattle; (k) plowing of land, with the exception of measures for forest firefighting; (l) haymaking, except for ensuring fire safety; (m) explosive works; (n) burning of vegetation and grassland fires, except for case of extinguishing forest fires; (o) water logging; (p) introduction of alien species; (q) transit and stay of motor vehicles; (r) stay with dogs, except for service dogs; (s) flight of aircraft and helicopters below 2000 meters above the territory of the reserve; and (t) disturbance and feeding of wild fauna species by the visitors.
Subject: Environment gen., Forestry, Wild species & ecosystems
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Decreto Supremo Nº 019-2016-PCM ─ Reglamento de la Ley Nº 30018, Ley de promoción del uso de la información de patentes para fomentar la innovación y la transferencia de tecnología.
Policy_Content: El presente Decreto Supremo aprueba el Reglamento que tiene por objeto desarrollar y regular las disposiciones contenidas en la Ley de promoción del uso de la información de patentes para fomentar la innovación y la transferencia de tecnología. La Dirección de Invenciones y Nuevas Tecnologías del Instituto Nacional de Defensa de la Competencia y de la Protección de la Propiedad Intelectual (INDECOPI), es el órgano competente para conocer y tramitar todos los asuntos relativos a patentes de invención y modelos de utilidad a nivel nacional. La Dirección de Invenciones y Nuevas Tecnologías es el órgano responsable de la implementación, actualización y sostenibilidad de la base de datos de información de patentes incluidas en el registro nacional, así como de la promoción del acceso, uso y aprovechamiento de la información técnica de patentes incluida en los registros nacionales e internacionales.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, South America, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Decreto Supremo Nº 008-2016-EM ─ Establece el uso obligatorio de GPS en las unidades de transporte de hidrocarburos que circulen en los departamentos de Cusco y Puno.
Policy_Content: El presente Decreto Supremo establece el uso obligatorio de Sistema de Posicionamiento Global (GPS) en las unidades de transporte de Petróleo Crudo, Gas Licuado de Petróleo, Combustibles Líquidos y Otros Productos Derivados de los Hidrocarburos que circulen en los departamentos de Cusco y Puno.  Los responsables de las unidades de transporte deberán brindar al Organismo Supervisor de la Inversión en Energía y Minería (OSINERGMIN) la información proveniente del sistema GPS. Dicha información estará a disposición de las autoridades de administración pública. El OSINERGMIN establecerá el tipo y características mínimas de los sistemas GPS, así como el uso obligatorio de precintos electrónicos de seguridad.
Subject: Mineral resources
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, South America, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Ley Nº 16 - Ley que establece el Régimen de los procesos concursales de insolvencia.
Policy_Content: La presente Ley establece el Régimen Concursal de Insolvencia, que tiene por objeto la protección del crédito y de los acreedores, a través del proceso de reorganización, a fin de garantizar la recuperación y conservación de la empresa eficiente, como unidad de explotación económica y fuente generadora de empleo, o mediante una liquidación judicial pronta y ordenada de la empresa ineficiente. Este Régimen se aplica a las personas naturales comerciantes y sociedades mercantiles inscritas o no inscritas en el Registro Público de Panamá, no excluidos por esta Ley, que tengan su domicilio comercial, sucursal, agencia o establecimiento en la República de Panamá.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, General
Geographical_area: Americas, Central America, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North-East Pacific, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: National Environmental Management: Air Quality Act (39/2004): Regulations for the Procedure and Criteria to be followed in the Determination of an Administrative Fine in terms of section 22A of the Act, 2016 (No. 332 of 2016).
Policy_Content: These Regulations of the Minister of Environmental Affairs, made under section 53 of the National Environmental Management: Air Quality Act, 2004, provide for the procedure and criteria to be followed in the determination of administrative fine when an application is submitted in terms of section 22A of the Act. A person operating a listed activity without a valid atmospheric emission licence may apply to the licensing authority for an atmospheric emission licence in terms of section 22A of the Act.
Subject: Air & atmosphere
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, South Atlantic, Southern Africa

Policy: Decree No. 80 of the Cabinet of Ministers validating general Technical Regulation on safety of agricultural machinery and equipment.
Policy_Content: This Technical Regulation sets forth safety requirements for construction of agricultural machinery and equipment, including field engines (tractors), seeding machinery and machinery for chemical treatment (plant protection) of soil and application of fertilizers. It establishes compliance with safety standards, including noise pollution and emissions. Agricultural machinery and equipment shall be subject to identification by means of identification mark. Information for customers must be clear, complete and reliable. Enforcement of this Technical Regulation shall be performed by public authority, which shall perform state supervision over the application thereof.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Aral Sea, Asia, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Central Asia, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Landlocked Developing Countries, North Asia
Entry into force notes: This Decree enters into force six months after the date of its official publication.

Policy: Resolución Nº 490 - Fija el cupo global para el otorgamiento de permisos y autorizaciones de aprovechamiento forestal de bosques naturales en la jurisdicción de la Corporación Autónoma Regional para el Desarrollo Sostenible del Chocó (CODECHOCÓ).
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución fija el cupo global para el otorgamiento de permisos y autorizaciones de aprovechamiento forestal persistente y doméstico de bosques naturales, en un volumen de 300 489 metros cúbicos, en el departamento del Chocó, jurisdicción de la Corporación Autónoma Regional para el Desarrollo Sostenible del Chocó (CODECHOCÓ). Para permitir o autorizar un aprovechamiento forestal persistente o doméstico en áreas sin Plan de Ordenación Forestal (POF), la CODECHOCÓ, priorizará en las áreas localizadas en la Zona Tipo B.
Subject: Forestry
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North-East Pacific, South America, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Order No. 81 of the Ministry of Natural Resources and Ecology validating the Regulation on state nature reserve of federal significance “Pozarym”.
Policy_Content: This Order establishes that on state nature reserve of federal significance “Pozarym” shall be classified as complex (landscape) protected area constituted for an indefinite time period. Nature reserve shall be located in the Republic of Khakassia. It shall perform the following tasks: (a) conservation of natural ecosystems (complexes, landscapes); (b) conservation and reproduction of wild fauna species, including rare and endangered animal species; (c) protection of natural habitats and migratory routes of wild fauna species; (d) performance of ecological monitoring; (e) scientific research; and (f) ecological education and educational tourism. The following activities shall be prohibited on the territory of state nature reserve: (a) commercial, artisanal and sport fishing and industrial fisheries; (b) hunting; (c) presence with firearms, pneumatic arms and missile weapons; (d) exploration of subsoil and mining, including soil disturbance; (e) land reclamation and irrigation; (f) clear felling of forest species and collection of soft resin; (g) burning of vegetation; (h) waste disposal; (i) explosive works; and (j) ploughing up (except for ploughing up for forest fire prevention purposes), haymaking, grazing and passage of agricultural animals.
Subject: Environment gen., Wild species & ecosystems
Keyword: Protected area,Ecosystem preservation,Protection of habitats,Monitoring,Research,Education,Tourism,Management/conservation,Wild fauna,Endangered species,Migratory species,Protection of species
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Decreto Nº 2.281 – Cambia la denominación de la Empresa Nacional de Proyectos Agrarios S.A. (ENPA, S.A) por Corporación Venezolana para la Agricultura Urbana y Periurbana S.A.
Policy_Content: El presente Decreto cambia la denominación de la Empresa Nacional de Proyectos Agrarios S.A. (ENPA, S.A) por el de Corporación Venezolana para la Agricultura Urbana y Periurbana S.A., y se la adscribe al Ministerio del Poder Popular de Agricultura Urbana, que tendrá por objeto impulsar el aparato productivo agrícola, pecuario y acuícola, en zonas urbanas y periurbanas, en toda su cadena de valor y servicios conexos, mediante operaciones financieras, comerciales, tecnológicas y organizacionales, que contribuyan a la seguridad y soberanía agroalimentaria y aseguren el acceso, la calidad y el justo valor de los bienes y servicios generados, con la participación protagónica del Poder Popular.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North Atlantic, South America

Policy: Decreto Nº 37 - Modifica el Decreto Nº 97, que reglamenta la emisión del certificado de fomento a las agroexportaciones.
Policy_Content: El presente Decreto modifica el que reglamenta y autoriza la emisión de los certificados de fomento a las agroexportaciones, en el sentido de autorizar la impresión de nuevos Certificados de Fomento a las Agroexportaciones, que serán transferibles por endoso.

Policy: Decreto Nº 81 - Modifica el Decreto Nº 29, que reglamenta la Ley Nº 4, que establece el sistema de intereses preferenciales al sector agropecuario.
Policy_Content: El presente Decreto modifica el que implementa la Ley que establece el sistema de intereses preferenciales al sector agropecuario a través del Fondo Especial de Compensación de Intereses (FECI), en relación a las funciones de la Comisión FECI, conformada por el Ministro de Economía y Finanzas, el Ministro de Desarrollo Agropecuario y el Superintendente de Bancos, y con los intereses preferenciales que resultan de la aplicación de un descuento en la tasa de interés pactada.

Policy: Agreement between the Federal Service for Hydrometeorology and Environmental Monitoring (ROSHYDROMET) and the Government of Kursk region on cooperation in the field of hydrometeorology and related fields, environmental monitoring and monitoring of pollution on the regional territory.
Policy_Content: This Agreement defines the intentions of the Parties in the main areas of cooperation between Roshydromet and the Government of Kursk region on the issues referred to the subjects of joint management of the Russian Federation and the regions of the Russian Federation, requiring concerted action and joint decisions in the framework of works in the field of hydrometeorology and related fields, in the field of state environmental monitoring, improvement of the functioning of an integrated system of observations of the state of the environment in the territory of Kursk region, assessment and forecast of the state of  changes thereof under the impact of natural and anthropogenic factors. The Agreement is designed to strengthen cooperation between the Parties in the field of state environmental monitoring, adoption and implementation of target programs and planned environmental protection activities, providing the population and regional executive bodies with information on the state of the environment and its pollution. The main areas and forms of interaction between the Parties shall be as follows: (a) ensuring the functioning and improvement of the state observation network and territorial system of observations of the state of the environment and its pollution in the regional territory; (b) improving the efficiency of forecasting of natural disasters, phenomena and creation of optimal conditions for the improvement of the level of protection of the population and reduction of damage caused by natural disasters; (c) improvement of early warning system for the population related to dangerous natural phenomena and actual and projected changes in weather and environmental pollution, which may threaten the life and health of the population and cause damage to the environment; and (d) planning and implementation of joint programs and activities in the fields of interaction, exchange of information, working meetings and conferences on the most important issues requiring joint solutions in the of state environmental monitoring and environmental pollution on the territory of Kursk region.
Subject: Air & atmosphere, Environment gen.
Keyword: Contract/agreement,Pollution control,Monitoring,Disasters,Early warning system/emergency intervention system,Public health,Data collection/reporting,Access-to-information
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific
Entry into force notes: This Agreement enters into force from the date of signature.

Policy: Decree-Law No. 18/2016 establishing the Legal Regime for Extraction of Aggregates.
Policy_Content: This Decree-Law, consisting of 61 articles divided into seven Chapters, establishes the Legal Regime for Extraction of Aggregates. It is applicable to extractive operations of aggregates in the dunes, in the coastal strip and in the territorial sea, as well as in the streams. In addition, it regulates licences, fees sanctioning regime, and derogation, in the applicable part, from the Regulation of the Basic Law of Environmental Policy, approved by Legislative Decree No. 14/97 of 1 July, namely with regard to the competent authority for the application of the fine, and sanctions for exploitation of aggregates for civil construction without a licence, in violation of the conditions provided for in the law and in violation of technical, hygiene, safety and environmental protection measures and landscape recovery. Amendments of Decree-Law No. 2/2002 of 21 January specify the ban on the extraction of sand from dunes, beaches, inland waters, the coastal strip and the territorial sea to a depth of 10 meters.
Subject: Environment gen., Mineral resources, Sea
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Atlantic Ocean Islands, North Atlantic, Sahel, Small Island Developing States, Western Africa
Entry into force notes: This Decree-Law enters into force on the day after its publication.

Policy: Resolution No. 36/2016 approving the National Strategy and Business Plans of Cape Verde's Protected Areas (ENAP - 2015-2024).
Policy_Content: This Resolution approves the National Strategy and Business Plans of Cape Verde's Protected Areas (ENAP). This Strategy, consisting of several environmental and financial issues completed by five Annexes providing for possible scenarios, has the following main objectives: allowing the maximization of environmental results in a limited financial context, usually focused on the short term, assisting to foresee a period of 5 to 10 years, spending the annual revenues, allowing the development of a comprehensive strategy to implement management objectives set out in Planning and management Plans, and modulate the activity of protected areas within the available resources, which focuses on geography and natural values of the archipelago of Cape Verde. Through the implementation of the National Cape Verde's Protected Areas System, including their protection and maintenance, estimated management and investment costs and revenue sources for funding, as well as in the Biosphere Reserve the islands of Fogo and Santo Antao, analysing the financing gap of the system of protected areas and mapping the Action Plan/Business to implement a coherent and effective financial strategy.
Subject: Environment gen., Wild species & ecosystems
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Atlantic Ocean Islands, North Atlantic, Sahel, Small Island Developing States, Western Africa

Policy: Decree-Law No. 38/2016 approving the Sal Island Conservation Strategy and Plan.
Policy_Content: This Resolution approves the Sal Island Conservation Strategy and Plan. This Plan, consisting of 9 sections, has the following objectives: maintaining different, unique and characteristic ecosystems; protecting species of wild animals and plants according to particular traditional values; protecting areas of particular genetic diversity, such as, areas with a variety of ecosystems, endemic species and natural heritage of great aesthetic or scientific value. In addition, it promotes the tourism sector in natural sites and preserves places of great interest for scientific research of geographical, cultural, archaeological and historical sites. These sites aim at conserving the natural and cultural resources, and are assessed through the institutional framework and the SWOT analysis (Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities and Threats) of the island of Sal, with the purpose of tracing the island's conservation strategy, defining their conservation plan, and regulating the monitoring and evaluation.
Subject: Environment gen., Wild species & ecosystems
Keyword: Environmental planning,Land-use planning,Public land,Urban land,Protected area,Tourism,Wetlands,Ecosystem preservation,Management/conservation,Cultural heritage,Protection of habitats
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Atlantic Ocean Islands, North Atlantic, Sahel, Small Island Developing States, Western Africa
Entry into force notes: This Resolution enters into force on the day after its publication.

Policy: Resolution No. 32/2016 approving the Regional Framework of Territorial Planning for Boa Vista island (EROT-BV).
Policy_Content: This Resolution approves the Regional Framework of Territorial Planning for Boa Vista island (EROT-BV). This Regional Framework, consisting of 6 Chapters and several maps and tables, is a strategical territorial development planning tool, constituted by the Regulation, the graphics, including plants and the territorial models, the report and the implementation programme, which defines the territory of the island organizational model, establishing general rules, general indications, assisted by the National Guidelines for Territorial Planning, as well as specific rules as a set of detailed rules aimed at planning of land occupations, constituting the reference to the municipal planning and guiding the special plans of territorial planning. In addition, it focuses also on the special conditions, on space categories and on its monitoring, evaluation and implementation.
Subject: Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Atlantic Ocean Islands, North Atlantic, Sahel, Small Island Developing States, Western Africa

Policy: Resolution No. 33/2016 approving the Regional Framework of Territorial Planning for Maio island (EROT-Maio).
Policy_Content: This Resolution, consisting of 4 articles, approves the Regional Framework of Territorial Planning for Maio island (EROT-Maio). This regional framework (in the Annex), consisting of 6 Chapters and several maps and tables, aims at the land use planning of the EROT and covers the entire island of Maio area, with the limits expressed in the Territorial Model Form specified in the text. The EROT has a 12 year validity period counted from its publication in the Official Gazette of the Republic of Cape Verde, but it may be revised, modified or suspended before the expiry of that period.
Subject: Environment gen.

Policy: Resolution No. 35/2016 approving the Cape Verde National Protected Areas Strategy (ENAP), general policy to all National Network of Protected Areas (RNAP).
Policy_Content: This Resolution approves the Cape Verde National Protected Areas Strategy (ENAP), general policy to all National Network of Protected Areas (RNAP). This Strategy main objectives are in particular: establishing guidelines for a long-term expansion plan, including control strategies and/or mitigating the impacts of climate change. The Strategy also aims at improving protected areas for the adaptation to climate change; promoting the expansion and consolidation of the National Network of protected areas and allowing the actors of civil society, local communities and non-governmental organizations to participate in the creation and selection of protected areas.

Policy: Regional Law No. 10-RZ “On public polling in municipal units”.
Policy_Content: This Regional Law establishes the modalities of public polling in municipal units with a view to ensure public participation in the performance of local government, with the consideration of public opinion by local self-government bodies. Public polling shall be conducted within three months from the date of decision for performance of public polling. Public polling shall be conducted among the residents on the territory of a municipal unit.
Subject: Environment gen.

Policy: Resolution SAR/CEDERURAL No. 15 regulating the Programme called "Terra Boa" for corn seeds supply in the year 2016.
Policy_Content: This Resolution, consisting of 7 articles, regulates the Programme called "Terra Boa" for corn seeds supply in the year 2016. This Programme, under the "Programme Equivalence in Products", encourages the acquisition of up to 220,000 bags of corn seeds and aims to support the self-sufficiency of corn in the state of Santa Catarina for the year 2016. Its main objectives are to: ensure income to farmers, increase tax revenues, regulate product import from other states and also to put on the market high quality product. The beneficiaries of this programme are all farmers in the National Programme for Strengthening Family Agriculture - Pronaf, and non-profits that have on family farming their livelihood, within the State of Santa Catarina, and have no debts owed to the Programme State Department of Agriculture and Fisheries - SAR.  The accredited must sign purchase and sale agreement with the farmers, establishing the salary for the year 2017, committing to the transfer of the amounts of subsidies for corn seed purchased by producers, classified according to the criteria of productivity, technological and financial costs, the allocation of the following values per bag of seeds from each group: Group I: R $ 40.00; Group II: R $ 50.00. Group III: R $ 70.00 and Group IV: $ 100.00.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Food & nutrition
Keyword: Policy/planning,Legal proceedings/administrative proceedings,Agricultural development,Financial agricultural measures,Subsidy/incentive,Cereals/grains/rice,Family farming,Food security
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North Atlantic, South America, South Atlantic
Entry into force notes: This Resolution enters into force on the day of its publication.

Policy: Decreto Supremo Nº 002-2016-MINAGRI ─ Política Nacional Agraria.
Policy_Content: La Política Nacional Agraria es un instrumento multisectorial, de alcance nacional, cuyo objetivo general es conseguir el incremento sostenido de los ingresos y medios de vida de los productores y productoras agrarios, priorizando la agricultura familiar, sobre la base de mayores capacidades y activos más productivos, y con un uso sostenible de los recursos agrarios en el marco de procesos de creciente inclusión social y económica de la población rural, contribuyendo a la seguridad alimentaria y nutricional. La Política Nacional Agraria se centra doce ejes, para cada uno de los cuales define los objetivos y los correspondientes lineamientos estratégicos: 1) Manejo Sostenible de Agua y Suelos; 2) Desarrollo Forestal y de Fauna Silvestre; 3) Seguridad Jurídica sobre la tierra; 4) Infraestructura y tecnificación del riego; 5) Financiamiento y seguro agrario; 6) Innovación y tecnificación agraria; 7) Gestión de Riesgo de Desastres en el sector agrario; 8) Desarrollo de capacidades; 9) Reconversión productiva y diversificación; 10) Acceso a mercados; 11) Sanidad Agraria e Inocuidad Agroalimentaria; 12) Desarrollo Institucional.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Food & nutrition, Forestry, Land & soil, Cultivated plants, Water, Wild species & ecosystems
Keyword: Agricultural development,Smallholders/peasants,Poverty,Agricultural land,Agro-forestry,Biodiversity,Capacity building,Climate change,Community management,Disasters,Early warning system/emergency intervention system,Equipment,Erosion,Financial agricultural measures,Fiscal and market measures,Freshwater resources management,Gender,Governance,Indigenous peoples,Irrigation,Land tenure,Local government,Ownership,Sustainable development,Sustainable use,Food security,Forest management/forest conservation,Timber,Timber extraction/logging,Soil conservation/soil improvement,Soil pollution/quality,Plant protection,Plant production,Pests/diseases,Freshwater quality/freshwater pollution,Pollution control

Policy: Ordonnance n° 2016-011  P-RM du 17 mars 2016 portant création de l’unité de gestion de la grande muraille verte.
Policy_Content: La présente Ordonnance crée l’unité de Gestion de la Grande Muraille Verte (UGMV), rattachée au Secrétariat général du Ministère chargé de l’Environnement, ayant pour mission d’assurer la réalisation et la gestion du segment malien de la barrière verte de protection contre l’avancée du désert dans la bande sahélienne comprise entre les isohyètes 100 et 400 mm sur une distance de 2.600 km de long et 215 km de large.
Subject: Environment gen., Forestry, Land & soil, Wild species & ecosystems

Policy: Decreto Nº 474 - Modifica el Decreto Único Reglamentario del Sector Administrativo de Minas y Energía, en lo relacionado al uso racional y eficiente de la energía eléctrica en la publicidad exterior visual.
Policy_Content: El presente Decreto modifica el Decreto Único Reglamentario del Sector Administrativo de Minas y Energía, en lo relacionado con medidas transitorias para el uso racional y eficiente de energía eléctrica en publicidad exterior visual, disponiendo que los usuarios de publicidad exterior visual que utilicen el servicio público de energía eléctrica del Sistema Interconectado Nacional (SIN), ante la presencia de circunstancias extraordinarias que pongan en riesgo la prestación de dicho servicio, deberán contribuir a disminuir el consumo para alcanzar los mayores beneficios en el uso eficiente de la energía. De persistir la alta demanda energética que pueda llevar a la limitación del suministro de energía, los alcaldes municipales podrán, transitoriamente, fijar condiciones que incluyan horarios y zonas de restricción de la publicidad exterior visual que utilice el servicio de energía eléctrica del SIN.
Subject: Energy
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North-East Pacific, South America, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Nairobi City County Public Participation Act, 2015 (No. 11 of 2015).
Policy_Content: This Act provides with respect to the public participation process in Nairobi City County. The object and purpose of this Act is to- (a) give effect to the provisions of Chapter Eleven of the Constitution in respect of public participation; (b) provide a framework for participation by the public in the affairs of the County through actively informing the form and content of legislation, policy and development plans formulated by the County Government; (c) provide for a framework for informed, effective, efficient and sustainable engagement of the public in the County in the formulation of policy, legislation, budgeting and implementation of the development plans and programmes by the County Government etc. Public participation in the activities of the County Government shall be guided by specified principles. The County Government shall promote and facilitate public participation in the county and shall develop a culture of democratic governance that complements a system of participatory governance. The County Executive Committee Member responsible for matters of Public Service in the County shall be in charge of public participation in the County Executive. The Act sets out participation mechanisms also at ward and village levels and gives special attention to community development.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Eastern Africa

Policy: Acuerdo Nº 5-2016-DGMM - Reglamento sobre los requisitos mínimos de seguridad marítima para los marinos a bordo de las embarcaciones que navegan en aguas jurisdiccionales de Honduras.
Policy_Content: El presente Acuerdo aprueba el Reglamento sobre los requisitos mínimos de seguridad marítima para los marinos a bordo de las embarcaciones que navegan en aguas jurisdiccionales de Honduras, el cual dispone que todo marino nacional debe contar con el respectivo Certificado del Curso Básico de Seguridad Marítima, y que consiste en la formación básica que aplica para aquellos tripulantes de buques comprometidos en cualquier función de ese buque como parte elemental de las operaciones y con obligaciones específicas y designadas de seguridad y previsión de la contaminación.
Subject: Environment gen., Fisheries, Sea

Policy: Decreto Nº 39.648/MIDIS/MIDEPLAN - Uso de mapas sociales para georeferenciación de información como herramienta para la identificación, priorización y caracterización de la población.

Subject: Agricultural & rural development

Policy_Content: This Regulation hereby officially establishes the national annual Programme for the use of funds granted by the state budget fund of the Republic of Serbia in 2016, in the part that was granted as budget for forests and forest related activities.

Policy: West Pokot County Disaster and Emergency Management Act (No. 3 of 2016).
Policy_Content: This Act designs and establishes the county disaster management structure and provides with respect to disaster prevention and mitigation in the West Pokot County. It establishes the Disaster Management Committee, the Disaster Management Unit, and the County Disaster Management Fund, defines functions and powers of the Committee and the Unit, and provides with respect to the administration of the Fund. The objects of this Act are to — (a) establish an efficient structure for the management of disasters; (b) enhance the capacity of the county government and other County stakeholders to effectively manage the impacts of disasters and emergencies and to take all necessary action to prevent or minimize threats to life, health and the environment from natural and man-made disasters and other emergencies; (c) ensure that the county government effectively coordinates with other relevant agencies to mitigate the impacts of disasters; (d) ensure transparency and accountability in disaster management; (e) vest authority in persons to act during times of disaster in accordance with this Act; and (f) implement mechanisms to reduce risks and hazards that may cause, contribute to or exacerbate disaster situations in the county. The Disaster Management Unit shall prepare the County Disaster Management Plan.
Subject: Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Eastern Africa

Policy: West Pokot County Urban Planning Act, 2016 (No. 4 of 2016).
Policy_Content: This Act establishes a legislative framework for — (a) classification of areas as urban areas; (b) governance and management of urban areas; (c) participation by the residents in the governance of urban areas; and (d) other matters for the attainment of these objectives. An area may be classified as an urban area if it satisfies the criteria set out under this Act or any other written law. Subject to the provisions of this Act, a board of a municipality or town committee shall, among other things, formulate and implement an integrated development plan, and control land use, land sub-division, land development and zoning by public and private sectors for any purpose, including industry, commerce, markets, shopping and other employment centres, residential areas, recreational areas, parks, entertainment, passenger transport, agriculture, and freight and transit stations within the framework of the spatial and master plans for the town or municipality as may be delegated by the county government, control land use, land sub-division, land development and zoning by public and private sectors for any purpose, including markets, recreational areas, parks, entertainment, and agriculture.An integrated urban area or town development plan shall include, amongst others, provide a framework for regulated urban agriculture and shall be the basis for the preparation of environmental management plans.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Environment gen., Land & soil
Keyword: Urban and peri-urban agriculture,EIA,Environmental planning,Land-use planning,Institution,Authorization/permit,Policy/planning,Public participation,Governance,Sustainable development
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Eastern Africa

Policy: Regulation (2016:320) on the protection of geographical information.
Policy_Content: This Regulation implements the Law on sensitive geographical information with respect to measurement of marine areas and water bodies, land surveying, photographing and other mapping and survey activities. Only authorized public bodies may carry out such activities. The Swedish Armed Forces, the Land Survey and the Swedish Maritime Administration may distribute compilations geographical information according to section 9 of the Act (2016: 319) on the protection of geographical information. These public bodies may also Regulations on the enforcement of the Law with respect to the application procedure at the respective authority.

Policy: Law (2016: 319) on the protection of geographical information.
Policy_Content: This Law contains provisions to protect sensitive geographical information. The Law contains provisions that limit the right to 1. sea measurement, 2. photography or similar registration from aircraft, and 3. dissemination of a compilation of geographical information. Hydrographic surveys may not be conducted in Swedish territorial waters, except for lakes, rivers and canals.

Policy: Commission Implementing Decision (EU) 2016/412 authorising Member States to provide for a temporary derogation from certain provisions of Council Directive 2000/29/EC in respect of ash wood originating or processed in Canada.
Policy_Content: Article 5(1) of Directive 2000/29/EC, in conjunction with point 2.3 of Section I of Part A of Annex IV to that Directive, provides for special requirements concerning the introduction into the Union of ash (Fraxinus L.) wood originating in Canada. By way of derogation to those provisions, this Decision stipulates that Member States may authorize the introduction into their territory of wood of Fraxinus L. originating or processed in Canada which, prior to its movement out of Canada, satisfies the conditions prescribed.
Subject: Forestry, Cultivated plants

Policy: Landfill Tax (Amendment) Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 376 of 2016).
Policy_Content: The Regulations make amendments to the Landfill Tax Regulations 1996  in order to make changes to the operation of the Landfill Communities Fund (the ‘LCF’). These Regulations, first, reduce the maximum amount of credit that a registered person may receive in respect of LCF contributions in any contribution year. Secondly, the Regulations prevent registered persons making payments to approved bodies on condition that the sums paid may only be invested in order to generate interest. Thirdly, these Regulations preclude approved bodies from providing financial and other services to other such bodies. The Regulations also amend the requirements on approved bodies to retain records made in the course of the operation of the LCF.
Subject: Land & soil, Waste & hazardous substances
Keyword: Soil conservation/soil improvement,Soil pollution/quality,Environmental fees/charges,Special fund,Offences/penalties

Policy: Renewables Obligation Closure Order (Northern Ireland) 2016 (S.R. No. 174 of 2016).
Policy_Content: This Order provides that no new renewables obligation certificates (ROCs) are to be issued under a renewables obligation order in respect of electricity generated by a large onshore wind generating station unless the electricity is generated in any one of the circumstances provided for in this Order. It defines a large onshore wind generating station as an onshore wind generating station where the total installed capacity of the station is more than five megawatts. The new arrangements apply to generating stations accredited after a certain date or stations with  additional capacity added after a certain date.
Subject: Energy

Policy: Presidential Decree No. 99 “On transformation of the national park “Belovezhskaya pushya”.
Policy_Content: This Presidential Decree establishes that the national park “Belovezhskaya pushya” has as its purpose conservation of ecosystems in their natural state, research related to unique forests, biological diversity and landscape diversity, reproduction of disturbed natural complexes of particular ecological, historical and cultural value, and also use of the aforesaid area for environmental protection, scientific research, educational and recreational purposes. The following activities shall be prohibited on the territory of the national park “Belovezhskaya pushya”: (a) drainage and land reclamation; (b) effluent waste water discharge; (c) scientific experiments that may cause alteration of the natural state; (d) organization of tourist camps outside authorized areas; (e) introduction of alien species; (f) haymaking in forest areas; and (g) application of plant protection substances by air-spraying by aircraft.
Subject: Forestry, Wild species & ecosystems
Geographical_area: CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA
Entry into force notes: This Presidential Decree enters into force after its official publication.

Policy: Acuerdo Ministerial No. 35-2016 : Declarar Estado de Emergencia Fitosanitaria, por el Incremento Significativo del Gorgojo del Pino (Dendroctonus spp) dentro del Territorio Nacional y por la Amenaza que Presenta la Conducción de la Plaga en los Bosques de Coníferas en la República de Honduras Cercanos al Territorio Nacional.
Policy_Content: El presente Acuerdo declara Declarar Estado de Emergencia Fitosanitaria por el incremento significativo del gorgojo del pino (Dendroctonus spp) dentro del territorio nacional y por la amenaza que representa la condición de la plaga en los bosques de coníferas en la República de Honduras cercanos al territorio nacional. Se prevé la implementación de un Plan de Contingencia, que incluirá las correspondientes medidas fitosanitarias.

Policy: Regulation 215 dated 16.3.2016 establishing “Green Guard” task force to draft emergency measures for the prevention, reduction, and undoing of damages done in public and private forests.
Policy_Content: The Green Guard task force is established as a temporary body in charge of issuing emergency measures for the prevention, reduction and undoing of damages in private and public forests in line with Law 5/2016 on the moratorium on forests. Its operations in central, regional, and local levels are headed by the Deputy Minister of Environment. The operational structure is composed of police units from the state police, military police and other armed forces, state inspectorate of Environment and Forests, and tax inspection services. Detailed duties and rules of procedure for technical, logistical, and financial issues will be set forth in a joint order of the Ministry of Environment, Ministry of Interior, Ministry of Defense and Ministry of Finance.
Subject: Forestry
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Mediterranean, Southern Europe

Policy: Ley Nº 926 - Modifica la Ley Nº 28, Estatuto de Autonomía de las Regiones de la Costa Atlántica de Nicaragua.
Policy_Content: La presente Ley modifica la que aprueba el Estatuto de Autonomía de las Regiones de la Costa Atlántica de Nicaragua, modificando su título y sustituyéndo “Costa Atlántica” por “Costa Caribe”, en consecuencia de lo cual se leerá así: Ley Nº 28, Estatuto de Autonomía de las Regiones de la Costa Caribe de Nicaragua. Se establecen dos Regiones Autónomas en lo que comprende la Costa Caribe: 1) La Región Autónoma de la Costa Caribe Norte que tiene su jurisdicción sobre el territorio de las Islas y Cayos adyacentes, y su sede administrativa es la ciudad de Bilwi o Puerto Cabezas; 2) La Región Autónoma de la Costa Caribe Sur que tiene su jurisdicción sobre el territorio de las Islas y Cayos adyacentes, y su sede administrativa es la ciudad de Bluefields.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Water
Keyword: Agricultural development,Cultural heritage,Indigenous peoples,Common property,Community management,Right to water,Governance,Human rights

Policy: Announcement of the Department of Fisheries contamination standards for toxins or anything else that may be harmful to humans or to aquatic animals.
Policy_Content: These Rules, issued by the Director-General of the Department of Fisheries under section 100 of the Fisheries Ordinance of 2015, stipulate that the contamination standards of toxins or any other substance in the catch shall not exceed the levels as set out in the attachment attached to this Announcement. Section 100 grants the Director-General the power to prohibit fisheries operation in such a fishing ground over a period of time prescribed if a particular fishing ground is faced with a state of pollution or contamination involving toxins or any other matter potentially harmful to human beings or to aquatic animals to a degree exceeding the standards prescribed by the competent official.
Subject: Environment gen., Food & nutrition, Fisheries, Sea

Policy: Poverty reduction strategy.
Policy_Content: This Poverty reduction strategy is a multisectoral policy document is aimed at radical revision of existing mechanisms of state influence on the situation on the labor market, as they do not meet current requirements. The country's poverty rate remains consistently high. According to the latest available information as of 2015, 23.8 percent of the population was below the relative poverty line. Poverty among the retirement age (21.7 percent) remains high due to the low level of pension provision. At the same time, a considerable part of pensioners is outside the boundaries of social integration, so the issues of increasing their involvement in all spheres of public life, creating conditions to meet the special needs of the elderly, adapting to their needs of living conditions, jobs, transport, leisure places, etc. are urgent. Poverty risks increase as settlements diminish. The social support system for vulnerable groups needs improvement in terms of increasing its impact on poverty reduction.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Geographical_area: Black Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA

Policy: Order No. 161-r of the Cabinet of Ministers validating Poverty Alleviation Strategy.
Policy_Content: One of the main factors exacerbating poverty in Ukraine has been the deteriorating market labor, especially in regions with large concentrations of internally displaced persons. The current mechanisms of state impact on the situation on the labor market do not correspond to modern requirements and need a radical overhaul. The existing infrastructural problems in Ukraine determine the specifics of poverty by living conditions. In this regard, the most vulnerable to poverty and social exclusion is rural population: 45.7 percent of households suffer from a lack of facilities providing household services; 41.8 percent - due to the lack of timely provision of emergency medical services in the inhabited areas; 28.5 percent - due to the lack of nearby healthcare facilities; every fourth household - due to lack of regular daily transport connection with inhabited area with more developed infrastructure; more than 50 percent - due to the inability to provide basic household utilities in the apartment.
Subject: General
Geographical_area: Black Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA

Policy: County Governments (Amendment) Act, 2016 (No. 1 of 2016).

The county governor shall confer the status of an urban area to the seat of the county government in accordance with the provisions set out in the Urban Areas and Cities Act.

Policy: Resolución Nº 004-2016-OEFA ─ Modifica la Resolución Nº 008-2013-OEFA, Reglamento del Régimen de Contratación de Terceros Evaluadores, Supervisores y Fiscalizadores del Organismo de Evaluación y Fiscalización Ambiental (OEFA).
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución modifica el Reglamento del Régimen de Contratación de Terceros Evaluadores, Supervisores y Fiscalizadores del Organismo de Evaluación y Fiscalización Ambiental (OEFA), a efectos de optimizar los procesos de selección y contratación de los terceros, así como precisar las funciones a su cargo. Además, se modifica el procedimiento de inscripción por el cual las personas naturales y jurídicas solicitan al OEFA su incorporación en el Registro de Terceros Evaluadores, Supervisores y Fiscalizadores del OEFA, como también la modificación de la inscripción y las causales de cancelación.

Policy: Décret nº2016-0155 PM-RM du 15 mars 2016 fixant l’organisation et les modalités de fonctionnement des cellules de passation des marchés publics.
Policy_Content: Le présent décret fixe l’organisation et les modalités de fonctionnement des cellules de passation des marchés publics. Il précise notamment les attributions des Cellules de passation des marchés publics; la composition du personnel des cellules de passation des marchés publics; la nomination du personnel des Cellules de Passation des Marchés publics; l’avis préalable des cellules de passation des marchés publics; le règlement des différends; et les Des ressources.

Policy: Resolución Nº 1 - Compila la reglamentación del destino del crédito agropecuario y rural, define sus beneficiarios y condiciones financieras.
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución compila la reglamentación del destino del crédito agropecuario y rural, define sus beneficiarios y condiciones financieras. Se entiende por crédito de fomento agropecuario y rural el que se otorga para ser utilizado en los distintos eslabones de las cadenas productivas agropecuarias y rurales, así como los servicios de apoyo y/o complementarios relacionados.   Las actividades financiables, son: 1) lo relacionado con la siembra, sostenimiento y cosecha de especies vegetales; 2) lo relacionado con las explotaciones pecuarias, acuícolas, piscícolas, especies menores y zoocría; 3) lo relacionado con la transformación y/o comercialización de productos nacionales originados en cualquiera de los eslabones de las cadenas productivas agropecuarias y rurales; 4) lo relacionado con la prestación de servicios de apoyo y/o complementarios requeridos en cualquiera de los eslabones de las cadenas productivas agropecuarias y rurales; 5) las actividades rurales como el turismo rural y ecológico, las artesanías, la transformación de metales y piedras preciosas, incluyendo las actividades de mercadeo, transformación de productos y prestación de servicios que se realicen en torno a ellas; 6) todas las actividades rurales por medio de la línea de microcrédito; 7) la constitución, compra o capitalización de personas jurídicas que tengan por objeto desarrollar la actividad agropecuaria o rural en el territorio nacional; 8) la construcción o mejoramiento de vivienda rural; 9) la normalización de cartera que comprende la refinanciación, reestructuración y consolidación de pasivos originados en créditos agropecuarios y rurales; 10) todas aquellas cadenas y actividades productivas agropecuarias, agroindustriales y rurales que determine el Gobierno nacional como prioritarias para el desarrollo del sector agropecuario y rural.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Keyword: Agricultural development,Financial agricultural measures,Credit,Legal proceedings/administrative proceedings,Agro-forestry,Fiscal and market measures,Subsidy/incentive
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North-East Pacific, South America, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Resolución Nº 2 - Compila y modifica la reglamentación y operatividad del Fondo Agropecuario de Garantías (FAG).
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución compila y modifica la reglamentación y operatividad del Fondo Agropecuario de Garantías (FAG), en base a las nuevas facultades extraordinarias condediddas al Presidente de la República para crear, reasignar, modificar y distribuir competencias, funciones u objetivos a la Comisión Nacional de Crédito Agropecuario, que es el organismo rector del financiamiento del sector agropecuario, y al Fondo para el Financiamiento del Sector Agropecuario (Finagro), para diseñar e implementar políticas de financiamiento, de gestión de riesgos agropecuarios y microfinanzas rurales, respetando en todo caso el esquema de inversión forzosa.

Policy: Resolución Nº 3 - Compila y actualiza la reglamentación de los incentivos y subsidios a través de crédito agropecuario y rural.
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución compila y modifica la reglamentación de los incentivos y subsidios a través de crédito agropecuario y rural, en base a las nuevas facultades extraordinarias condediddas al Presidente de la República para crear, reasignar, modificar y distribuir competencias, funciones u objetivos a la Comisión Nacional de Crédito Agropecuario, que es el organismo rector del financiamiento del sector agropecuario, y al Fondo para el Financiamiento del Sector Agropecuario (Finagro), para diseñar e implementar políticas de financiamiento, de gestión de riesgos agropecuarios y microfinanzas rurales, respetando en todo caso el esquema de inversión forzosa.

Policy: Resolución Nº 49 - Manual Operativo del Proyecto Alianzas Productivas del Ministerio de Agricultura y Desarrollo Rural.
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución aprueba el Manual Operativo del Proyecto Alianzas Productivas (PAAP) del Ministerio de Agricultura y Desarrollo Rural (MADR), con el propósito de presentar los lineamientos para la ejecución del PAAP desde la finalización de su etapa de transición entre el cierre del empréstito con el Banco Mundial, que dio origen al Proyecto, y el nuevo esquema definitivo para la operación del mismo dentro del MADR. El Manual constituye una herramienta de consulta para las entidades y personas que participan directa o indirectamente en la ejecución de los diferentes componentes del Proyecto, consolidando normas y procedimientos para las entidades y organizaciones involucradas.

Policy: Resolución Nº 6 - Plan Anual de Incentivo a la Capitalización Rural (ICR) y condiciones financieras de las Líneas Especiales Crédito (LEC) para la vigencia 2016.
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución establece el Plan Anual de Incentivo a la Capitalización Rural (ICR) y condiciones financieras de las Líneas Especiales Crédito (LEC) para la vigencia 2016. Dentro de los términos dispuestos en la Resolución Nº 3 de 2016, la distribución de los recursos dispuestos mediante convenio suscrito con el Ministerio de Agricultura y Desarrollo Rural para la ejecución del ICR, se sujetará a las siguientes reglas: 1) Por lo menos el 40% le corresponderá a inversiones ejecutadas por Pequeños Productores; 2) Las inversiones ejecutadas por Grandes Productores no podrán acceder a más del 20% de los recursos totales asignados para el ICR. Los recursos se dividirán en dos segmentos: a) ICR Plan Colombia Siembra; b) ICR General u Ordinario.

Policy: Regional Decree No. 82-pp validating the Regulation on regional state nature landscape reserve “Verkolsky”.
Policy_Content: Regional state nature landscape reserve “Verkolsky” shall be constituted with a view conservation and reproduction of valuable natural and cultural landscapes. The following activities shall be prohibited: (a) timber exctraction and felling (except for sanitary felling, selective felling and forest rehabilitation feklling); (b) disturbance of nidifugous hiding places of wild fauna species and collection of eggs; (c) land reclamation; (d) entry and movement of motor vehicles outside roads of common access; (e) waste disposal; (f) application of toxic chemicals, mineral fertilizers and nutrients; and (g) organization of tourist camps.
Subject: Environment gen., Wild species & ecosystems
Keyword: Protected area,Ecosystem preservation,Protection of habitats,Management/conservation,Wild fauna
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Regional Decree No. 81-pp validating the Regulation on state nature biological reserve of regional significance “Kuloysky”.
Policy_Content: This Regional Decree establishes that state nature reserve of regional significance "Kuloysky" shall be constituted with a view of conservation river system of the Kuloy River, to reproduce and restore the number of wild fauna species, rare and endangered species wild fauna and wild flora species, other living organisms, their habitats and the general ecological balance of the protected area, also in the process of the reserve territory management. Owners and tenants of land plots located within the boundaries of the reserve are obliged to observe the special protection regime established in the nature reserve. The following activities shall be prohibited on the whole territory of the protected area: (a) capture of wild fauna species that are not subject to hunting; (b) hunting, except for the purpose of regulation of the number of game; (c) destruction of nesting grounds and mating grounds of wild fauna species; collection of eggs; (d) felling of forest species, except for sanitary felling, felling for forest fires extinguishing; (e) entry, exit and parking of motor vehicles, except for service vehicles; (f) exploration of subsoil and mining; (g) waste disposal; (h) organization of tourist camps and making fires outside specially equipped areas; (i) release of alien species; (j) land reclamation and drainage; (k) application of chemicals, mineral fertilizers, plant protection means and nutrients; and (l) destruction or damaging warning signs and information boards.
Subject: Environment gen., Wild species & ecosystems
Keyword: Protected area,Ecosystem preservation,Protection of habitats,Wild fauna,Wild flora,Birds,Endangered species,Protection of species
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Law No. 1289 “On dehkan farm”.
Policy_Content: This Law sets forth the legal basis for the establishment and activities of dekhkan farm and is aimed at creating favorable conditions for the development of this economic activity. Dehkan farm shall be subject of entrepreneurship performing production, storage, processing and trade of agricultural commodities; the aforesaid activities are based on the personal labor of one person or joint activity of a group of individuals on a land plot and property belonging thereto. Members of the dehkan farm shall be citizens of the Republic of Tajikistan, except for restrictions established by the national legislation. A land plot for the establishment of a dekhkan farm shall be allotted on condition of lifelong inheritable tenancy, with the right of alienation or without the right to alienate it, in the application of a citizen (citizens) by a decision of local executive bodies (local self-government) and district public authorities (in urban areas). The land plot for constitution of a dehkan farm is allotted entirely within the same locality. Dehkan farms shall have the right to constitute associations of dehkan farms.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Land & soil
Keyword: Agricultural land,Family farming,Farming,Agricultural commodities,Local government,Transport/storage,Internal trade,Land tenure
Geographical_area: Asia, Central Asia, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Landlocked Developing Countries, North Asia
Entry into force notes: This Law enters into force after its official publication.

Policy: Governmental Decree No. 128 validating the Regulation on protection of surface water.
Policy_Content: This Governmental Decree establishes the modalities of surface water protection against pollution, clogging and exhaustion in the process of performance of various economic activities that could have negative impact on surface water. Surface water protection shall be considered to set up favourable conditions for water uses and ensuring ecological well-being of the population. Effluent waste water discharge shall be performed in accordance with the validated rates of maximum allowable limits of discharge of pollutants. Industrial effluent waste water shall be used at maximum in recycling water supply.
Subject: Environment gen., Water
Keyword: Surface water,Water quality standards,Effluent waste water/discharge,Recycling/reuse,Pollution control,Freshwater quality/freshwater pollution,Aquaculture,Irrigation

Entry into force notes: This Governmental Decree enters into force 15 days after the date of its official publication.

Policy: Nairobi City County Community and Neighbourhood Associations Engagement Act, 2016 (No. 4 of 2016).
Policy_Content: The objectives of this Act are to- (a) establish a legal framework for the engagement, promotion and facilitation of community and neighbourhood associations in their support and co-operation with the county government in the delivery of services; (b) enhance public participation in the decision making by the county government especially with regard to service delivery and thus give effect to Article 10 of the Constitution; (c) recognize and facilitate community and neighbourhood initiatives in complementing county government services including in security waste management, water, and sanitation; (d) establish a recognition framework for the community and neighbourhood associations ; (e) provide for the competencies and responsibilities of the neighbourhood initiatives and associations; (f) strengthen capacities of associations to enforce regulations aimed at enhancing service provision. The objectives for which a neighbourhood association may be established shall include the co-operation of the residents in the, among other things, (a) conservation, generally of their environment and investments and the promotion of the integrity of their environment and investments and collaboration in the provision of services including water, solid waste collection and disposal. A neighbourhood association may be eligible to enter into a recognition agreement with the county government. The county government may delineate geographical zones for each association and enter into agency arrangements with an association for the purpose of providing services. The Act also provides for consultation with associations and  dispute resolution.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Water
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Eastern Africa

Policy: Ley Orgánica de Tierras Rurales y Territorios Ancestrales.
Policy_Content: La presente Ley Orgánica de Tierras Rurales y Territorios Ancestrales, tiene por objeto normar el uso y acceso a la propiedad de la tierra rural, el derecho a la propiedad de la misma que deberá cumplir la función social y la función ambiental. Regula la posesión, la propiedad, la administración y redistribución de la tierra rural como factor de producción para garantizar la soberanía alimentaria, mejorar la productividad, propiciar un ambiente sustentable y equilibrado, y otorgar seguridad jurídica a los titulares de derechos. Además esta Ley garantiza la propiedad de las tierras comunitarias, el reconocimiento, adjudicación y titulación de tierras y territorios de comunas, comunidades, pueblos y nacionalidades indígenas, pueblo afroecuatoriano y pueblo montubio, de conformidad con la Constitución, convenios y demás instrumentos internacionales de derechos colectivos.

Policy: Council Decision (EU) 2016/381 on the position to be adopted, on behalf of the European Union, within the Port State Control Committee of the Paris Memorandum of Understanding on Port State Control.
Policy_Content: This Decision specifies the position to be adopted on behalf of the European Union within the Port State Control Committee of the Paris Memorandum of Understanding on Port State Control. The aim is that port States ensure defence against substandard shipping, the monitoring of compliance with the international standards for safety, security, pollution prevention and on-board living and working conditions, so as to guarantee the effective enforcement of international standards by coastal Member States of the Union in respect of ships sailing in the waters under their jurisdiction and using their ports.
Subject: Environment gen., Sea
Entry into force notes: This Decision covers the period from 2016 to 2019.

Policy: Utilities Contracts Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 274  of 2016).
Policy_Content: These Regulations implement, for England and Wales and Northern Ireland, Directive 2014/25/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council on procurement by entities operating in the water, energy, transport and postal services sectors and repealing Directive 2004/17/EC. These Parts impose obligations on utilities in relation to how they award contracts for the execution of works, the supply of products or the provision of services. They set out  some general rules and principles that apply to a procurement within the scope of the Regulations and detailed rules to be followed in relation to a procurement. Particular procurement regimes for the procurement of social and other specific services and the use of design contests: these regimes impose less detailed requirements and allow greater flexibilities. Certain requirements are imposed on utilities on utilities in relation to recording and reporting information. The Regulations also contain provisions about remedies (and their facilitation) in relation to a procurement. In the case of water, these Regulations apply to the following activities: (a) the provision or operation of fixed networks intended to provide a service to the public in connection with the production, transport or distribution of drinking water; (b) the supply of drinking water to such networks. They also may apply to  contracts or design contests awarded or organised by utilities which pursue an activity referred to above and which are connected with one of the following— (a) hydraulic engineering projects, irrigation or land drainage, provided that the volume of water to be used for the supply of drinking water represents more than 20 percent of the total volume of water made available by such projects or irrigation or drainage installations; (b) the disposal of treatment sewage.
Subject: Energy, Water
Geographical_area: Atlantic Ocean Islands, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Atlantic, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Northern Europe

Policy: Concession Contracts Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 273 of 2016).
Policy_Content: These Regulations implement, for England and Wales and Northern Ireland, Directive 2014/23/EU of the European Parliament and Council on the award of concession contracts. These Regulations impose obligations and specify procedures in respect of the award of a concession contract by contracting entities, which term normally includes contracting authorities and utilities. These Regulations do not apply to; (a) a concession contract awarded to provide or operate fixed networks intended to provide a service to the public in connection with the production, transport or distribution of drinking water; (b) a concession contract awarded to supply drinking water to such networks; (c) a concession contract for either or both of the following— (i) hydraulic engineering projects, irrigation or land drainage, provided that the volume of water to be used for the supply of drinking water represents more than 20 percent of the total volume of water made available by such projects or irrigation or drainage installations; or (ii) the disposal or treatment of sewage, if the contract is connected with an activity referred to in paragraph (a) or (b).
Subject: Energy, Water
Geographical_area: Atlantic Ocean Islands, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Atlantic, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Northern Europe

Policy_Content: El presente Acuerdo establece el formato para notificar a la Secretaría de Energía del inicio de las negociaciones para el uso, goce, afectación o, en su caso, adquisición de los terrenos, bienes o derechos necesarios para realizar las siguientes actividades previstas en la Ley de Hidrocarburos: a) exploración de hidrocarburos; b) extracción de hidrocarburos; c) transporte de hidrocarburos, petrolíferos y petroquímicos por medio de ductos; d) reconocimiento y exploración superficial que se lleve a cabo para considerar la posible existencia de hidrocarburos.

Policy: Decree No. 42 of the Ministry of Public Health validating Sanitary rules and regulations “Radiation safety requirements in the process of collection and trade of waste metal”.
Policy_Content: This Decree sets forth safety requirements with a view of ensuring radiation safety in the process of of collection and trade of waste metal. It shall be mandatory for state bodies, other organizations, natural persons, including individual entrepreneurs. Radiation safety control shall be performed at the moment of acceptance, formation, shipment and receipt of waste metal. Means of transport used for transportation of waste metal shall be also subject to radiation control. The Decree contains the report form of radiation safety control.

Policy: Resolución Nº 111-2016-MINAGRI ─ Lineamientos para la ejecución del procedimiento de Rectificación de Áreas, Linderos, Medidas Perimétricas, Ubicación y otros Datos Físicos de Predios Rurales Inscritos.
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución aprueba los Lineamientos para la ejecución del procedimiento de Rectificación de Áreas, Linderos, Medidas Perimétricas, Ubicación y otros Datos Físicos de Predios Rurales Inscritos, con el objeto de establecer un adecuado procedimiento de rectificación de áreas, linderos, medidas perimétricas, ubicación y otros datos físicos de predios rurales inscritos, así como los Formatos correspondientes. Los presentes Lineamientos son de alcance nacional y de observancia obligatoria por los gobiernos regionales a los que se ha efectivizado la transferencia de la función referida al saneamiento físico legal de la propiedad agraria. Policy: Política de Estado para el Desarrollo Rural Territorial Costarricense (PEDRT) 2015-2030.
Policy_Content: La Política de Estado para el Desarrollo Rural Territorial Costarricense (PEDRT) es un instrumento de alcance nacional, relativo al período 2015-2030, que constituye el marco de referencia para articular la gestión interinstitucional con otros actores públicos y privados que ejecutan acciones en procura de la provisión de bienes y servicios, con base en las demandas identificadas por los actores sociales de los territorios rurales. El objetivo general de la política es fomentar el desarrollo inclusivo de los territorios rurales, reconociendo y respetando sus características propias y la identidad cultural de su población, por medio de un sistema de articulación público-privado, que reduzca las desigualdades e inequidades económicas, sociales, culturales, ambientales y político-institucionales, mediante el desarrollo de capacidades y oportunidades para sus habitantes.

Policy: Decree No. 42 of the Ministry of Public Health validating the Regulation on ensuring radiation safety in the process of collection and trade of scrap metal.
Policy_Content: This Decree sets forth mandatory rules and regulations for ensuring radiation safety in the process of collection and trade of scrap metal. In particular the provisions shall be applicable for collection, storage and transportation of scrap metal. Radiation check shall be performed in the form of acceptance test and control of lots of scrap metal destined for shipping and trade.

Policy: Botswana National Development Plan 11.
Policy_Content: Botswana National Development Plan 11 Volume 1 (April 2017- March 2023) is a national strategy developed to guide the medium term economic development path for the country under the theme “Inclusive Growth for the Realization of Sustainable Employment Creation and Poverty Eradication”. NDP 11 focuses on six broad-based national priorities of: Developing Diversified Sources of Economic Growth; Human Capital Development; Social Development; Sustainable Use of Natural Resources; Consolidation of Good Governance and Strengthening of National Security; and Implementation of an Effective Monitoring and Evaluation System.

Policy: Strategic Plan for Agricultural and Rural Statistics (SPARS-Kenya) 2015-2022.
Policy_Content: The Strategic Plan for Agricultural and Rural Statistics (SPARS-KEN) 2015-2022 is a national cross-sectoral plan whose objective is the establishment of an integrated system for quality agricultural and rural statistics. To this end, SPARS-KEN will cover five subsectors of agriculture: Crops (including Irrigation and inputs), Food Security/Safety/Nutrition; Livestock (including Apiculture); Fisheries (including Marine/Inland Fisheries and Aquaculture); Forestry and Environment/Natural resources (areas related to agriculture); and County Agriculture Statistics and Cross-cutting areas.
